name: Tim Elliot
description: elliot, who was on medication for depression, threatened suicide and then threatened to shoot a mason county sheriff's deputy.

name: Lewis Lee Lembke
description: washington county sheriff's deputies were answering a call about a domestic assault when lembke pointed his weapon at them.

name: John Paul Quintero
description: a wichita police officer, who had been told quintero was armed with a knife, shot quintero when he moved his hands toward his waistband.

name: Matthew Hoffman
description: hoffman, who brandished a bb gun at officers in a san francisco police parking lot, left a suicide note addressed to them that said "you did nothing wrong."

name: Michael Rodriguez
description: evans police officers shot rodriguez outside a billiard parlor after he threatened them.

name: Kenneth Joe Brown
description: an oklahoma highway patrol officer shot brown during a struggle at a traffic stop.

name: Kenneth Arnold Buck
description: he shot at chandler police officers who suspected him in a burglary.

name: Brock Nichols
description: a saline county sheriff's deputy checking on the welfare of a toddler in nichols's care shot him when he pointed a gun at the deputy.

name: Autumn Steele
description: a burlington police officer said he shot at steele's family dog and struck steele by accident.

name: Leslie Sapp III
description: a federal fugitive task force was trying to arrest him when he pointed an air-powered pellet gun at them.

name: Patrick Wetter
description: wetter, who stabbed a police dog, was shot by stockton police officers responding to a home invasion.

name: Ron Sneed
description: an officer with the freeport police shot sneed as he threatened his girlfriend.

name: Hashim Hanif Ibn Abdul-Rasheed
description: he tried to stab a columbus police officer at port columbus international airport. abdul-rasheed had spent three years in a psychiatric hospital. in 2000, a judge found him not guilty by reason of insanity in an attempted murder case.

name: Nicholas Ryan Brickman
description: a des moines police officer shot brickman following a bank robbery.

name: Omarr Julian Maximillian Jackson
description: when new orleans police stopped a suspicious car, maximillian ran and then fired at the officers.

name: Loren Simpson
description: simpson drove toward deputies of the yellowstone county sheriff's department who were searching for a burglary suspect.

name: James Dudley Barker
description: barker, looking for work clearing snow from home sidewalks, was shot after he hit a salt lake city police officer with his shovel.

name: Artago Damon Howard
description: howard was shot as he struggled with a union county sheriff's deputy who had responded to a burglary alarm at a pharmacy.

name: Thomas Hamby
description: hamby fired at syracuse police who were responding to a report of a domestic disturbance.

name: Jimmy Foreman
description: foreman shot his son, then pointed a gun at an england police officer.

name: Andy Martinez
description: martinez threatened el paso police officers during a traffic stop.

name: Tommy Smith
description: he was shot by tuscola and arcola police officers who were investigating a domestic disturbance.

name: Brian  Barbosa
description: barbosa was shot during a confrontation with a south gate police officer who was investigating an attempted carjacking.

name: Salvador Figueroa
description: a north las vegas police officer tasered and shot figueroa during a confrontation.

name: John Edward O'Keefe
description: he fired at albuquerque police officers during a foot chase.

name: Richard McClendon
description: he was shot in his mother's home after he charged at a jourdanton police officer. police say mcclendon had a history of mental illness.

name: Marcus Golden
description: he drove his suv toward two st. paul police officers.

name: Michael Goebel
description: goebel drove a truck through a closed garage door toward officers from several police departments.

name: Mario Jordan
description: standing in the street, he shot a rifle at chesapeake police. officers were responding to a report that he was suicidal.

name: Talbot Schroeder
description: he refused repeated commands from an old bridge police officer to drop the knife.

name: Robert Edwards
description: he pointed a gun at lake jackson police officers called to the home by a roommate.

name: Jeffrey R. Nielson
description: he was shot during a struggle with four officers from draper and west valley city police.

name: Donte Sowell
description: sowell ran from a traffic stop and then opened fire on    an indianapolis police officer and a security guard.

name: Kavonda Earl Payton
description: payton refused commands by aurora police to drop his gun after a convenience-store robbery.

name: Quincy Reed Reindl
description: his mother believed he was suicidal and called bloomington police. officers shot him when he refused to drop his gun.

name: Jose Ceja
description: ceja charged at fairfield police officers answering a domestic disturbance call. police said he was suicidal.

name: Nathan Massey
description: a louisiana state police officer shot him through the window of a trailer where he was holding his girlfriend hostage.

name: Scott Hall
description: he died in a shootout with a texas ranger and an agent from the bureau of alcohol, tobacco, firearms and explosives.

name: Zaki Shinwary
description: he confronted a fremont police officer looking for a man who had brandished a knife at children and others.

name: Terence Walker
description: during a foot chase, walker dropped a gun, picked it up and turned toward the officer with it in his hand.

name: Pablo Meza
description: meza, standing in a downtown street waving a gun, was shot when he pointed the weapon at los angeles police officers.

name: Daniel Brumley
description: he stabbed a fort worth police officer during a struggle at a traffic stop.

name: Jonathan Guillory
description: guillory pointed a gun at maricopa police officers who were responding to 911 hang-up calls. guillory was a military contractor in afghanistan and suffered from post-traumatic stress disorder, his wife said.

name: Carter Castle
description: the vietnam veteran confronted kentucky state police and magoffin county sheriff's officers who came to arrest him. castle suffered from post-traumatic stress disorder.

name: Paul Campbell
description: he died in a confrontation with weymouth police officers after his mother was found stabbed to death outside the family's home.

name: Dewayne Carr
description: he rammed his suv into the police vehicles of scottsdale  officers who were investigating a credit-card fraud operation.

name: Todd Allen Hodge
description: hodge, hiding in a crawl space from riverside county sheriff's deputies, shot a police dog then emerged with a gun.

name: Miguel Angel de Santos-Rodriguez
description: he exchanged gunshots with u.s. border patrol agents who were searching for smugglers.

name: Isaac Holmes
description: he refused orders from st. louis metropolitan police officers to drop the firearm.

name: Andrew Toto
description: toto fired at a derry police officer responding to a call that he was suicidal and armed.

name: Tiano Meton
description: meton drove through a border inspection checkpoint, led u.s. border patrol agents on a 30-mile chase and then  pointed a pellet gun at them, authorities said.

name: Kristiana Coignard
description: coignard walked into the longview police building lobby with "i have a gun" written on her hand. she then pulled a knife out of her waistband. coignard had exhibited signs of mental illness at age 12 and took medication for depression, her father said.

name: Robert Francis Mesch
description: mesch led austin police on a chase, climbed out of his truck and pointed a gun at officers. his wife had called police to report that he was suicidal.

name: Demaris Turner
description: turner rammed a police k-9 vehicle as lauderhill police officers tried to arrest him for driving a stolen car.

name: Jose Antonio Espinoza Ruiz
description: levelland police officers were responding to a domestic-disturbance call when ruiz walked out of his house wielding a knife.

name: Wendell King
description: king fired at fort worth officers when they opened his bedroom door. his mother had called police to check on him.

name: Daryl Myler
description: after robbing a walgreens pharmacy, myler exchanged gunfire with rexburg police officers.

name: Darin Hutchins
description: hutchins threatened people at a toddler's birthday party and refused a baltimore police officer's commands to drop the knife. an activist group said hutchins suffered from a mental illness.

name: Orlando Jude Lopez
description: a pueblo police chase of lopez, a suspect in a home invasion, ended in a shootout.

name: William Campbell
description: campbell approached winslow police officers with a gun when they arrived at his house. police were responding to a call about him holding a woman at gunpoint.

name: Jessie Hernandez
description: denver police officers shot hernandez when she drove a stolen car toward them in an alley.

name: Raymond Kmetz
description: kmetz shot at new hope officers attending a swearing-in ceremony in city hall. kmetz had spent time in a psychiatric hospital.

name: Joshua Omar Garcia
description: garcia, handcuffed in the front seat of a patrol car after a chase, was shot by lynn county sheriff's deputies when he tried to drive away in the vehicle.

name: David Garcia
description: garcia charged at kern county sheriff's deputies with a knife. the deputies were responding to a report that he was suicidal.

name: Nicolas Leland Tewa
description: phoenix police officers confronted tewa, a robbery suspect, at a motel. officers shot him when he jumped into a car and rammed a police vehicle.

name: Chris Ingram
description: during a traffic stop, ingram shot clifton police officer and a greenlee county sheriff's deputy.

name: Jermonte Fletcher
description: fletcher fired at members of a federal fugitive task force looking to arrest him on drug and weapons charges.

name: Tiffany Terry
description: terry threatened omaha police officers with knives when they arrived at her home to investigate a domestic disturbance. family members said terry suffered a mental breakdown after struggling with lupus and rheumatoid arthritis.

name: Alan Lance Alverson
description: alverson shot a police dog and was then killed by wise county sheriff's deputies.

name: Matautu Nuu
description: nuu hit a police dog with a hammer and then tried to attack stockton police officers with it. nuu's daughter said he had been hospitalized for mental illness.

name: Cody Karasek
description: karasek shot at rosenberg police after fatally shooting his ex-girlfriend and injuring another man.

name: Ralph Willis
description: willis, a suspect in a homicide, made a threatening gesture toward a stillwater police officer.

name: Alan James
description: james fired at kentwood and state police called to his home for a disturbance. family members said james, who took anti-depressants, was drinking heavily and became increasingly paranoid.

name: John Barry Marshall
description: six officers from a federal fugitive task force shot marshall, wanted on a burglary charge, after he tripped as he fled and his gun discharged.

name: Victor Manuel Reyes
description: a harris county sheriff's deputy on patrol heard gunshots and pursued reyes, who refused to drop his weapon. reyes was suspected in two homicides.

name: Edward Donnell Bright
description: baltimore county police officers shot bright after he approached them with a knife outside a 7-eleven. family members have said bright struggled with mental illness.

name: Jacob Haglund
description: haglund shot a bay city police officer called to investigate a home invasion. the officer returned fire.

name: David Kassick
description: a hummelstown police officer shocked kassick with a taser and then shot him twice in the back as he lay on the ground.

name: Francis Murphy Rose III
description: rose, a former california state trooper, fired at a police helicopter and then at san bernardino county sheriff's deputies. family members said rose suffered from post-traumatic stress disorder.

name: Ledarius D. Williams
description: williams ran at the sight of two st. louis police officers on patrol and, when they caught up, pointed a gun at them. he had been shot by police in a past incident.

name: Yuvette Henderson
description: emeryville police said henderson shoplifted, threatened a security guard with a gun, tried to carjack nearby vehicles and then pointed her gun at officers.

name: Dewayne Deshawn Ward
description: contra costa sheriff's deputies shot ward when he came at them with a knife. deputies were serving a protective order secured against him by his mother. family members said ward was diagnosed with schizophrenia three years ago.

name: Anthony Purvis
description: purvis's wife called 911 after he shot her in the hand.  after douglas police arrived, purvis stood on his front porch and pointed a gun at an officer. his family reported later that he had been under psychiatric care in the days before the shooting.

name: Jeremy Lett
description: a tallahassee police officer investigating a burglary at an apartment complex confronted lett, a resident. they fought and the officer shot lett five times.

name: Izzy Colon
description: colon confronted two undercover officers with the orlando police drug unit and refused to drop his gun.

name: Salvador Muna
description: a u.s. marshals task force trying to arrest muna attempted to block his vehicle at an intersection. officers shot him when he moved into the back seat of his car and began firing at them.

name: Joaquin Hernandez
description: hernandez was caught in the crossfire of a gun battle between his friend, salvador muna, and u.s. marshals.

name: Jimmy Ray Robinson Jr.
description: robinson, a suspect in five convenience store robberies, was shot by waco police officers after he led them on a high-speed car chase.

name: Markell Atkins
description: the shooting happened as a u.s. marshals task force sought to arrest atkins at his home on a warrant in the death of a 1-year-old boy. he threatened officers with a knife.

name: Paul Alfred Eugene Johnson
description: johnson robbed a bank in neighboring corona, carjacked a minivan to escape and led corona police on a short chase before officers shot him.

name: Herbert Hill
description: oklahoma city police officers were trying to serve a warrant at hill's house. hill, who was sitting in a car, began shooting at police.

name: John  Sawyer
description: a riverside county sheriff's deputy shot sawyer when he pulled a replica handgun from his pocket. the deputies had been patrolling the neighborhood and suspected sawyer was involved in drug activity.

name: James Allen
description: gastonia police forced their way into allen's home during a wellness check requested by his family. allen, an army veteran, approached an officer with a gun.

name: John Martin Whittaker
description: anchorage police shot whittaker after he rammed police vehicles during a traffic stop, led officers on a chase and exchanged gunfire with them.

name: Sawyer Flache
description: flache, who had been shooting out streetlights, shot at an austin police helicopter overhead.

name: Vincent Cordaro
description: cordaro, who had threatened to kill family members, fired at clarkstown officers after a seven-hour standoff. police said he struggled with depression and had previously attempted suicide.

name: Joseph Paffen
description: paffen's girlfriend called the orange county sheriff's office after he violated a protective order and tried to meet her at a grocery store. as deputies arrived, paffen shot at them.

name: Larry Hostetter
description: a nocona police officer shot hostetter, a montague county sheriff's deputy, after responding to a reported disturbance at his house.

name: Kenneth Kreyssig
description: officers with the aroostook county sheriff's office and maine state police went to the home where kreyssig lived after his family reported he was suicidal.

name: Desmond Luster
description: a dallas officer arresting a burglary suspect shot luster as he drove his pickup at them. luster had chased and shot at  the robbery suspect.

name: Antonio Zambrano-Montes
description: zambrano-montes was shot by three pasco police officers after he threw rocks at vehicles. his family said he had struggled with mental illness.

name: Anthony Bess
description: memphis police said bess pointed a gun at officers who were attempting to arrest him on a warrant. bess's family, in the house at the time, dispute the details of this shooting.

name: Brian Fritze
description: deputies with the garfield county sheriff's department had been dispatched to investigate a report of domestic violence.

name: Phillip Watkins
description: san jose police said watkins charged at officers with a knife. family said watkins was depressed and suicidal at the time of the shooting.

name: Fletcher Ray Stewart
description: after a brief chase, stewart brandished a bb gun at a deputy from the tallapoosa county sheriff's department. stewart's family said he wrestled with mental illness.

name: Jonathan Larry Harden
description: harden stole a vehicle and during a chase tried to ram officers from san bernadino police.

name: Andres Lara-Rodriguez
description: lara-rodriguez seized a pest-control truck at gunpoint and led officers from kansas highway patrol and kansas city, mo., police on a 30-minute chase.

name: Richard Carlin
description: a trooper with the pennsylvania state police killed carlin as officers attempted to arrest him on a warrant.

name: Matthew D. Belk
description: when a deputy with the carroll county sheriff's office stopped belk's car, he climbed out with the gun in his hand.

name: Daniel Mejia
description: mejia threatened a deputy with the pinal county sheriff's department outside a market. family members told detectives mejia suffered from severe mental illness.

name: Jason C. Hendrix
description: hendrix fled a traffic stop, then shot at baltimore county police. he is suspected of killing his parents and sister in kentucky over losing computer privileges.

name: Roy Joy Day
description: a laredo police officer was moving to frisk day when day pulled a gun and opened fire.

name: Lavall Hall
description: hall's mother called 911 because he was outside in the cold in his underwear. miami gardens police shot him after he refused to drop a broomstick handle. hall was diagnosed with bipolar disease and schizophrenia, his family said.

name: Howard Brent Means Jr.
description: iuka police officers followed means into a wal-mart, where they exchanged gunfire.

name: Bruce Steward
description: steward brandished the hatchet at deputies with the clackamas county sheriff's office. steward, who suffered from depression, had said he wanted to provoke a fatal confrontation with law enforcement.

name: Lawrence Caldwell
description: caldwell pointed a gun at a marana police officer who had been called to investigate a domestic assault.

name: Michael K. Casper
description: casper pointed a gun at a boise police officer, who had responded to a report that a man was breaking out the windows of a duplex with a crowbar.

name: Cody Evans
description: evans pointed a pellet gun that looked like an assault weapon at provo police officers. his estranged wife told authorities that evans wanted police to kill him.

name: Betty Sexton
description: sexton approached a gastonia police officer holding a musket, and refused an order to drop it. officers had been called for a domestic disturbance.

name: Michael Ireland
description: called to investigate a suspicious person, a springfield police officer chased ireland on foot and then shot him during a confrontation.

name: Matthew Lundy
description: deputies from the eaton county sheriff's office were investigating a vehicle that had run into a ditch. lundy was inside the vehicle and had a gun.

name: Douglas Sparks
description: sparks stabbed two people with a knife at a vocational school and then brandished a bb gun at tewksbury police officers.

name: Pedro Juan Saldivar
description: officers from the val verde county sheriff's office and the del rio police shot saldivar after he threatened people with a machete and tried to run over officers with a tractor-trailer.

name: Janisha Fonville
description: fonville's girlfriend called police to help get her to a mental health center. police said she lunged at an officer with a knife, though her girlfriend disputed that.

name: Alejandro Salazar
description: salazar pointed a gun at members of a u.s. marshals service task force who were tailing him to serve warrants on robbery and aggravated assault charges.

name: Ruben Villalpando
description: following a police chase, villalpando walked toward an officer's patrol car with his hands up and refused the officer's orders to stop.

name: Stanley Lamar Grant
description: homewood police officers were carrying out a search warrant for drugs at grant's apartment when he began shooting at them.

name: Douglas Harris
description: harris's son called birmingham police to check on his father. when an officer and firefighter went to his apartment, harris pointed a gun at them. police said they had reports that harris suffered from dementia.

name: Jason Moncrief Carter
description: u.s. marshals and new mexico state police were attempting to arrest carter on a charge of sexual contact with a minor when he barricaded himself in an rv and threatened to shoot them.

name: Kent Norman
description: norman had beaten his father and was holding a knife to the throat of his mother, who both later thanked indianapolis police officers for saving their lives.

name: Bradford Leonard
description: leonard pointed a gun at a palm bay officer after police went to his home to investigate a 911 hang-up call.

name: Jerome Nichols
description: nichols stabbed his girlfriend in a domestic dispute, led police on a car chase and then attacked a catasauqua police officer with a 13-inch knife.

name: Daniel Elrod
description: elrod, a robbery suspect, disobeyed commands from omaha police to show his hands.

name: Robert Kohl
description: denham springs police responded to a call from kohl's mother saying her son was threatening suicide. police said kohl pointed a gun at them when they found him pacing a median between a hooters and a longhorn steakhouse.

name: Michael Wayne Smashey
description: u.s. marshals were attempting to arrest smashey on warrants for armed robbery and aggravated assault when he moved toward them with a knife.

name: Anthony Giaquinta
description: giaquinta killed his ex-wife and her boyfriend and then exchanged gunfire with habersham county sheriff's deputies.

name: A'Donte Washington
description: millbrook police officers were investigating a burglary at the home when washington opened fire.

name: Joseph Biegert
description: biegert's mother said she asked green bay police to check on her son, who had battled depression, after he called her and apologized for being a disappointment.

name: Glenn Lewis
description: lewis drove a car toward officers with the oklahoma city police department.

name: Francis Spivey
description: spivey, a decorated veteran, donned his air force uniform and called las vegas police threatening suicide. a police sniper shot him after a standoff during which spivey fired 23 rounds.

name: Alexander Phillip Long
description: long rammed the law enforcement vehicles of the u.s. marshal's service and terre haute police who were trying to arrest him. police said that long refused to show his hands and reached inside his jacket.

name: David Cuevas
description: cuevas ran away from lakeland police when they tried to arrest him in a park. police said he reached for his weapon.

name: Amilcar Perez-Lopez
description: perez-lopez, a robbery suspect, refused orders from plainclothes san francisco police officers to drop his weapon. his family has disputed the police account.

name: Rodney Biggs
description: gulfport police say briggs hit a light pole, refused to leave his vehicle and reached for a gun. his family said police tried to forcibly remove him from his car and shot him in the neck, adding that he had a history of chronic pain and could not get health care.

name: Crystal Lee Miley Harry
description: after a high-speed chase and a car crash, harry pointed a handgun at worth county sheriff's deputies.

name: Ernesto Javiar Canepa Diaz
description: santa ana police said diaz was in a vehicle that matched a description of one used in a robbery.

name: Chazsten Freeman
description: freeman shot at greenville county sheriff's deputies who were investigating a theft from a business.

name: Deven Guilford
description: guilord struggled with an eaton county sheriff's officer during a traffic stop and was shot seven times.

name: Thomas Allen
description: allen was a passenger in a car stopped by st. louis county police. when he tried to drive away, an officer climbed into the car to stop him and shot him during the altercation.

name: Jessica Uribe
description: a tucson police officer shot uribe when she approached him with the knife outside a fast food restaurant.

name: Cornelius J. Parker
description: parker, a suspect in three homicides, led a boone county sheriff's deputy on a car chase, then died in a shootout.

name: Ian Sherrod
description: sherrod killed three people, then pointed his gun at officers of the edgecombe county sheriff's department and state highway patrol. police said he struggled with paranoid schizophrenia.

name: Stephanie Hill
description: hill brandished a gun after officers pursued her from california into arizona. hill and another suspect shot at other motorists and fired at an officer during the car chase.

name: Donald Lewis Matkins
description: george county sheriff's deputies were called to investigate reports of a gunman shooting at mailboxes. when they arrived, matkins refused to come out of his residence and shot at officers.

name: Charly Leundeu Keunang
description: keunang, a homeless man, was shot in an altercation with los angeles police officers patrolling skid row. he had a history of mental health issues.

name: Hung Trieu
description: trieu argued at a restaurant, then got a gun and shot at the door of the business. a harris county sheriff's investigator, who was dining there, returned fire.

name: Shaquille Barrow
description: a joliet police officer, suspecting barrow in a theft, chased him on foot, then shot when barrow reached for a handgun in his pants.

name: Fednel Rhinvil
description: rhinvil pulled a handgun from his pocket as he struggled with a wicomico county sheriff's deputy.

name: Matthew Metz
description: tempe police officers were called to metz's apartment to check on a domestic disturbance. when they entered, metz stabbed one of the officers.

name: Derek Cruice
description: a volusia county sheriff’s deputy was part of a squad serving a search warrant for narcotics at the home when he shot cruice in the face.

name: Carl Lao
description: lao shot at two stockton police officers and a san joaquin county sheriff's deputy.

name: Tyrone Ryerson Lawrence
description: lawrence threatened his estranged wife with the knife and refused to drop it when milwaukee police arrived. a relative said lawrence had a long history of mental health issues.

name: Sergio Alexander Navas
description: navas, driving a stolen car, was shot by an officer when a police suv pulled alongside his vehicle during the chase. navas attempted to flee after being shot, but was caught and died of his wounds on the sidewalk.

name: Tyson Hubbard
description: while struggling with a lancaster county sheriff’s deputy trying to arrest him, hubbard reached for a gun and was shot by a deputy u.s. marshal. hubbard was being sought by a fugitive task force on an outstanding assault warrant.

name: Naeschylus  Vinzant
description: vinzant was shot by aurora police officers trying to arrest him on a warrant.

name: Andrew Anthony Williams
description: williams drove toward putnam county sheriff's deputies as they tried to arrest him during a drug sting.

name: Tony Robinson
description: robinson had taken hallucinogenic mushrooms and was reported to madison police for running in traffic and battery. police said he assaulted a responding officer as he entered his residence.

name: Adam Reinhart
description: reinhart pointed the gun at phoenix police officers, who said he was acting strangely when they encountered him.

name: Aurelio Duarte
description: duarte raised a rifle toward an oklahoma city police officer, who was investigating a report of a disturbance.

name: Michael McKillop
description: mckillop, a robbery suspect, tried to flee in his car, dragging a delaware state trooper through a drug store parking lot.

name: Monique Jenee Deckard
description: deckard, a suspect in a stabbing, charged anaheim police officers. she had a history of schizophrenia.

name: Lester Brown
description: officers with homeland security, n.c. alcohol law enforcement and the transylvania sheriff's department were trying to serve a search warrant related to the making of illegal alcohol.

name: James Brent Damon
description: damon and a companion tried to disarm officers from colorado parks and wildlife and the moffat county sheriff's office who stopped at their parked vehicle.

name: Cedrick Lamont Bishop
description: bishop died in a shootout with brevard county sheriff’s deputies and cocoa police. they were called to investigate a person shooting into homes and cars.

name: Anthony Hill
description: hill, naked and acting erratically, was shot when he ran toward a dekalb county police officer. hill was a veteran and had mental health issues.

name: Jamie Croom
description: croom, wanted in the slayings of two women, killed a deputy u.s. marshal when officers tried to arrest him at a motel.

name: Christopher Mitchell
description: port wentworth police responding to a 911 call concerning a domestic disturbance found mitchell stabbing a woman. then he stabbed an officer.

name: Edixon  Franco
description: franco called the ontario police department claiming to be suicidal. the police eventually located him in his vehicle. when he stopped, he charged at officers with a samurai sword.

name: Theodore Johnson
description: johnson opened fire on cleveland police officers, who were investigating a report of a domestic disturbance.

name: James Greenwell
description: greenwell, who was intoxicated and had a history of mental illness, began shooting at memphis police from the porch of his parents' home.

name: Benito Osorio
description: osorio climbed out of his truck and confronted santa ana police officers with a gun.

name: Ryan Dean Burgess
description: burgess pointed a bb gun that looked like a semi-automatic handgun at a kingman police officer. his mother had called 911 when burgess began punching walls.

name: Aaron Valdez
description: los angeles county deputies were responding to a call about two people trying to steal a car. as deputies questioned one suspect, valdez drove toward them at a high speed.

name: Gilbert Fleury
description: baldwin county sheriff's deputies had been called to fleury's home to investigate a disturbance. fleury pointed a gun at officers and is believed to have fired at least one shot.

name: William Russell  Smith
description: smith was armed when hoover police officers went to his home to investigate a report of a domestic disturbance.  smith's family told police that he had not been taking his medication to treat his mental illness.

name: Terry Garnett Jr.
description: garnett refused to pull over for a traffic stop and drove his suv toward a deputy with the cecil county sheriff's department.

name: Bobby Gross
description: metro transit police said gross, who was wearing no shoes or pants, rushed at them wielding a large tree branch. law enforcement officials described gross as troubled.

name: Fred  Liggett
description: liggett was shot by a deputy u.s. marshal who was serving an arrest warrant at the residence.

name: Andrew Driver
description: driver made several 911 calls threatening to kill fontana police officers. when they responded, he attacked them with a knife.

name: Antonio Perez
description: perez, who fled a traffic stop and car wreck, was shot by a los angeles sheriff's deputy when he put his hands in his waistband.

name: James Richard Jimenez
description: napa police were serving a search warrant when jimenez fled on his motorcycle, crashed and then reached for a gun, according to police.

name: Richard Castilleja
description: a san antonio police officer shot castilleja while he was firing into a crowd outside a bar. his family said he struggled with bipolar disease.

name: Clifton Reintzel
description: reintzel, who was disabled, had cut himself and then charged west virginia state police.

name: Aaron Siler
description: siler was shot when a kenosha police officer attempted to arrest him on a felony warrant.

name: Troy Ray Boyd
description: boyd tried to run over a pike county deputy with his four-wheeler.

name: Justin Tolkinen
description: tolkinen, who had a history of mental illness, was wearing a bulletproof vest and armed with an assault rifle. after an hour-long standoff, st. paul police fired into his home.

name: William Dean Poole
description: poole, sitting on a lawn mower, shot at officers from the gaston county police department. he had called a suicide hotline.

name: Eugene Smith
description: smith, a texas prison guard, opened fire on onalaska police who were called to investigate a man with a gun. friends said smith struggled with depression.

name: Roberto Leon
description: following a traffic stop, leon exchanged gunfire with police, stole another car at gunpoint and fled. he was later found dead inside a home.

name: Andrew Charles Shipley
description: shipley fired on medford police from his garage after a 19-hour standoff. he had grown increasingly paranoid, according to his girlfriend.

name: Declan Owen
description: owen shot at a bladen county sheriff's deputy and a bladenboro police officer who were responding to a report of a man with a gun.

name: Alice Brown
description: brown drove a car toward san francisco police officers who were investigating a car theft. her brother said she had a mental illness.

name: Jeff Alexander
description: alexander ignored commands from bakersfield police to drop his weapon.

name: Kaylene Stone
description: a glendale officer approached stone, who was in a vehicle outside a circle k, and shot her when she refused to drop the handgun.

name: Garland Lee Wingo
description: tallahassee police were called after someone reported a man sitting on a bench in the park with a weapon.

name: Kendre Alston
description: alston, who was driving a stolen car, rammed a jacksonville sheriff officer's patrol car and threatened the officer with a gun.

name: Jamison  Childress
description: childress, a murder suspect who had just illegally crossed into the united states from canada, sprayed a chemical at u.s. border patrol agents who confronted him. his mother said he had been diagnosed with a mental illness.

name: Robert Burdge
description: burdge, a former prison guard, was suspected of shooting another prison guard at his home. he was shot during a standoff with bakersfield police.

name: Shane Watkins
description: lawrence county sheriff's deputies say watkins, who was delusional and in need of hospitalization, lunged at them, but watkins's family has disputed that account.

name: Brandon Jones
description: officers with the cleveland police department confronted jones as he came out of a grocery store that he had broken into.

name: Brandon Rapp
description: a canyon county deputy, responding to a report of a domestic disturbance, shot rapp when he emerged from his home with a weapon drawn. it is unclear if rapp fired any rounds.

name: Justin Fowler
description: after a car chase and wreck, fowler killed a navajo nation police officer and wounded two others in a shootout.

name: Richard White
description: white, a taxi driver who suffered from mental illness, was chasing an airport security officer with the weapon when a jefferson parish sheriff's deputy opened fire.

name: Tyrel Vick
description: officers were trying to arrest vick in the killing of his brother. vick crashed his truck and shot at troopers.

name: James Ellis
description: ellis, who was fleeing a domestic disturbance call, shot an orleans county sheriff's deputy twice as the officer returned fire.

name: Gary Page
description: page told an emergency dispatcher that he wanted to be shot by officers and threatened a neighbor with a starter pistol. officers heard a gunshot from inside the apartment and page emerged, raising his gun toward them.

name: Jason Smith
description: smith assaulted a columbus police officer who was investigating a domestic disturbance.

name: Enoch Gaver
description: gaver wrestled a gun from a cottonwood police officer, shot the officer in the leg and was killed by a second officer.

name: Phillip Conley
description: conley, who had a long history of mental health problems, threatened a vallejo police officer with a large knife, police said, and left a note in his truck apologizing for forcing police to kill him.

name: Christopher Ryan Healy
description: portland police said healy came at them with the knife, but witnesses said healy drew the knife only after he'd been shot. his cousin said he struggled with paranoid schizophrenia.

name: Denzel Brown
description: brown, chased by suffolk county police for shoplifting, tried to carjack a car with a woman and children inside.

name: Devin Gates
description: santa clara police officers encountered gates, who was armed, as he robbed a 7-eleven. gates fired a shot at the convenience store clerk.

name: Stephen Snyder
description: snyder robbed a bank and then killed a wisconsin state trooper in a shootout.

name: Walter J. Brown III
description: brown led portsmouth police on a car chase and then brandished the gun during a struggle with officers. his family said he had a history of mental illness.

name: Scott Dunham
description: from his second-floor balcony, dunham shot and killed a san jose police officer before officers returned fire. his family said dunham had been suicidal in the past.

name: Nicholas Thomas
description: thomas tried to flee in a car from cobb county police officers with a warrant. police said he drove toward them. a witness has disputed that account.

name: Jeremy Lorenza Kelly
description: kelly fled into some woods and fired at florence county sheriff's deputies as they tried to talk him into giving up his gun.

name: Victor Terrazas
description: terrazas, suspected of killing a woman, died in a shootout with los angeles county sheriff's department deputies.

name: Joseph Tassinari
description: glendale police said that tassinari told an officer he was armed and then reached for his waistband. a neighbor said tassinari was vietnam veteran who suffered from post-traumatic stress disorder.

name: Deanne Choate
description: gardner county police were called when someone heard shots. choate refused orders to drop her gun.

name: Adrian Solis
description: los angeles police were called to solis's residence because he was suicidal and cutting himself. he approached an officer with kitchen knives.

name: Gary Kendrick
description: kendrick told a san diego county sheriff’s deputy to shoot him. then he pointed a shotgun at the deputy.

name: Jamalis Hall
description: a deputy with the st. lucie county sheriff’s office was part of a u.s. marshals task force serving a warrant on hall, who refused orders to drop a knife.

name: Adrian Hernandez
description: bakersfield police were trying to arrest hernandez for attempted murder, kidnapping and sexual assault when he fled and then pointed a gun at them. police later determined that it was a bb gun.

name: Neil Seifert
description: seifert fired a shotgun at webster and charlton county police. they were investigating a report of a domestic disturbance.

name: Megan Hockaday
description: oxnard police officers responded to a call about a domestic dispute and, within 20 seconds, shot hockaday after she approached them with the knife.

name: Harvey Oates
description: after a car chase and crash, west virginia state police officers tried to arrest oates, but he refused to drop his weapon.

name: Angelo West
description: west shot a boston police officer during a traffic stop.

name: Robert Rooker
description: pike county deputies say that rooker tried to run over them with his pick-up truck.

name: Byron Herbert
description: elizabethtown police found herbert assaulting a woman and brandishing his weapon.

name: Brian Babb
description: babb, whose family members said he was a combat veteran suffering from ptsd, pointed a rifle at eugene police officers.

name: John Marcell Allen
description: boulder city police officers had responded to reports of gunfire, and when they approached allen, he held up a pistol and began firing at officers.

name: Jeremy Anderson
description: a u.s. marshals task force and tampa police were attempting to arrest anderson on warrants when he was killed during a shootout with officers.

name: Benjamin Quezada
description: quezada, wearing a camouflage jacket, stood at an intersection with a pellet gun that resembled a rifle. quezada pointed the pellet gun at a baytown police officer who was responding to a call about him.

name: Mya Hall
description: hall, a transgender woman, tried to drive an suv through a checkpoint at the national security agency, authorities said.

name: Robert Washington
description: washington had pulled up next to a car and began shooting a woman, who later died, and her 12-year-old son, when hawthorne police officers shot him.

name: Shawn Clyde
description: hamilton police department officers shot clyde as he was stabbing his father.

name: Darrin Langford
description: rock island police officers were responding to a call of shots being fired when they encountered langford.

name: Donald Hicks
description: massac county sheriff's department deputies found hicks in a cemetery threatening to shoot himself. he refused to drop his gun and led them on a car chase.

name: Eric Harris
description: a tulsa county sheriff's reserve deputy inadvertently fired a gun instead of a taser as harris was being subdued on the ground by other officers.

name: Aaron Rutledge
description: rutledge, a member of the national guard, threatened to shoot himself and another person. a deputy from the rapides parish sheriff's office shot him when he pointed the gun at officers.

name: Christopher Prevatt
description: a frederick county sheriff's deputy went to the home to investigate a report of a domestic disturbance. prevatt lunged at the officer with a letter opener.

name: Justus Howell
description: a zion police officer shot howell twice in the back as he fled on foot with a gun he had taken from another teenager.

name: Walter Scott
description: a north charleston police officer shot scott in the back as he fled a traffic stop and struggle.

name: Paul Anderson
description: anderson, a former marine, jumped out of a car after it was stopped by anaheim police.

name: Ethan Noll
description: noll barricaded himself in his vehicle, threatened to kill new mexico state police officers and yelled at police to shoot him. police interviews with family members indicated that noll had been contemplating suicide for a year.

name: Ken Cockerel
description: police say cockerel was stabbing himself in the chest and then lunged at four phoenix police officers.

name: Richard Hanna
description: hanna charged at tehachapi police officers who were called to a domestic disturbance.

name: Alexander Myers
description: indianapolis police officers came to the home looking for a suicidal individual and myers fired at them with a rifle.

name: Desmond Willis
description: desmond crashed his truck into a fence and began firing at jefferson parish sheriff's deputies in a parking lot.

name: Tyrell J. Larsen
description: a bonneville sheriff's deputy opened fire after larsen refused to drop a .22 caliber rifle he was pointing at officers.

name: Erick Rose
description: pottawatomie county sheriff's officers said rose burglarized a home, traded in gunfire with a 70-year-old homeowner and crashed his car after a police chase.

name: Douglas Faith
description: faith opened fire on san antonio police officers after his car came to a stop.

name: Dexter Pernell Bethea
description: bethea tried to escape arrest after a drug deal and drove his car toward lowndes county sheriff's deputies, striking one of them in the hip.

name: Roberto Rodriguez
description: los angeles police department officers heard gunshots in the neighborhood and discovered a shooting victim. when they found and confronted rodriguez, he fired shots at them.

name: Joseph Jeremy Weber
description: weber, a liquor store robbery suspect, wouldn't drop a knife when a sunnyvale police officer confronted him. his family said he was a veteran struggling with post-traumatic stress disorder.

name: Mark Smith
description: smith knocked down a bristow police officer who was answering a call about him beating his wife and child in a field.

name: Gordon Kimbrell
description: kimbrell had consumed half a bottle of rum and thrown kitchen knives at family members before he attacked a santa rosa sheriff's deputy with a sword.

name: Don Smith
description: after an armed robbery and a carjacking, police in watseka, ill., shot smith as he tried to force a woman he kidnapped into a minivan.

name: Jess Leipold
description: pennsylvania state troopers found leipold in a prison  parking lot, shooting a rifle at the ground and in the air. leipold ignored orders to drop the weapon. police said he had a mental disorder.

name: Phillip Burgess
description: burgess pointed a gun at spartanburg county sheriff's deputies while officers were serving a search warrant at his home. seventeen shots were fired.

name: Angel Cresencio Corona
description: corona was attacking his father with a carpet knife when tehaman county sheriff’s deputies arrived.

name: Richard Reed
description: reed carjacked a vehicle and then opened fire on capitol and topeka police officers.

name: Donald Allen
description: allen, a veteran who struggled with schizophrenia, pointed his gun at a sand springs police officer who had been called to investigate gun shots in the neighborhood.

name: Mack Long
description: long fled from indianapolis police after they stopped the car in which he was riding.

name: Richard Dale Weaver
description: oklahoma city police said weaver refused to drop the machete, raised it over his head and approached an officer. neighbors said weaver struggled with mental problems.

name: Jason Lee Evans
description: sampson county sheriff's deputies shot evans following the robbery of the han-dee hugo's convenience store. evans suffered from mental illness, a relative said.

name: Isaac Jimenez
description: alton police officers were pursuing jimenez as a suspect in another shooting. when they came upon him, he pointed a firearm at the officers and was shot.

name: Colby Robinson
description: robinson, a suspect in two murders, was killed when he confronted desoto police who had chased him by car and on foot.

name: Christopher Grant Finley
description: finley struck a jonesboro police officer with a machete when police were trying to arrest him based on a warrant. finley's father said he had bipolar disorder and suffered from depression.

name: Tevin Barkley
description: barkley got into an altercation with miami-dade police officers, who were on bike patrol and had responded to reports of gunfire. his mother said he been drinking and playing with a gun, according to a police report.

name: Dante Noble
description: spartanburg police kicked down the door and found noble stabbing a 32-year-old woman, who later died from her injuries.

name: Frank Shephard
description: shephard climbed out of his vehicle and houston police officers ordered him to raise his hands. after he reached into his car, police opened fire.

name: Mark W. Adair
description: columbia police were seeking adair in connection to a robbery when officers encountered him in a parking garage at the university of missouri.

name: Stanley Watson
description: watson, whose family told police he was suicidal, killed his wife and shot his dog before barricading himself in his recreational vehicle. later, he came out firing two guns at canon city police officers.

name: Ernesto Flores
description: flores pointed his pellet gun at san bernandino county sheriff's deputies who had been called to investigate an erratic person. his family said he suffered from anxiety attacks.

name: Rodolfo Velazquez
description: velazquez was shot when he approached shafter police officers and ignored their orders to drop his weapon.

name: Jeffrey Kemp
description: chicago police officers heard gunfire and saw kemp jump from a van and run, before stopping and pointing a gun at them.

name: Elias Cavazos
description: cavazos fired at officers from the riverside county sheriff’s department and california highway patrol who tried to arrest him during a traffic stop.

name: Thaddeus McCarroll
description: mccarroll barricaded himself in his mother's house and then charged st. louis county police officers with a knife. police said he was mentally distressed.

name: Erik Tellez
description: tellez opened fire on phoenix police officers from inside of his van. police said he was known to have mental issues.

name: Grover Sapp
description: panama city police said sapp fired a shotgun and then pointed it at officers.

name: Michael Foster
description: wilmore police had responded to a call at the house and said foster refused to drop his gun. police said he was suicidal.

name: Dana Hlavinka
description: hlavinka, who had stabbed his wife, lunged at sidney police officers.

name: Santos Cortez Hernandez
description: hernandez was shot while hidalgo county sheriff's deputies were attempting to serve him an arrest warrant.

name: Daniel Wolfe
description: wolfe, a suspect in a carjacking, rammed one vehicle then accelerated forward toward a new jersey state trooper, who opened fire.

name: Daniel Covarrubias
description: lakewood police said covarrubias pointed a dark object at officers when they encountered him hiding in a lumberyard. the object turned out to be a cell phone. covarrubias had a history of mental problems.

name: Kimber Key
description: lexington county sheriff's officers were responding to a call that key was threatening to hurt himself with a knife.

name: Luis Martinez
description: martinez's wife called 911 because he was stabbing himself. when los angeles police officers arrived, he charged at them with his knife.

name: William Chapman
description: chapman, a shoplifting suspect, was shot during a struggle with a portsmouth police officer.

name: Carlos Saavedra Ramirez
description: the confrontation with bisbee police officers came after a woman reported that ramirez was acting aggressively in a safeway parking lot and banging on the windows of her car.

name: Jonathan Efraim
description: efraim opened fire inside a queens bar, then shot at new york city officers who chased him on foot. efraim had struggled with psychiatric issues for years.

name: Reginald McGregor
description: police say mcgregor aimed a gun at them after they arrived at a home for a call reporting a burglary suspect. the homeowner was shot in the hand by mcgregor prior to police arriving.

name: Lue Vang
description: vang had kidnapped his father-in-law and was holding a gun to his victim's head while sitting in a vehicle. boulder sheriff's deputies first tried to talk to vang. then one deputy fired.

name: Andrew Valadez
description: valadez walked down a street pointing a gun at himself and others before getting into a confrontation with the los angeles police.

name: Joseph Potts
description: potts shot a choctaw county sheriff's deputy and a hugo police officer and then set his house on fire and tried to grab an officer's gun.

name: Hector Morejon
description: a long beach police officer, answering a vandalism call, fired when he saw morejon extend his arm. the officer believed morejon was holding a gun. no weapon was found.

name: Karen Janks
description: janks, who had led authorities on a car chase that reached speeds up to 100 mph, put her car into reverse and struck three sonoma county sheriff's deputies.

name: Mark Cecil Hawkins
description: hawkins took shelter in a recreational vehicle when salem police tried to arrest him outside a walmart. after a seven-hour standoff, he died in a shootout.

name: Gary Timmie  Collins
description: collins fled a traffic checkpoint and brandished a gun at an oklahoma highway patrol trooper.

name: Todd Jamal Dye
description: dye, who had been told to get on the ground, ran and turned around and pointed a gun at a trinidad police officer.

name: Brandon Lawrence
description: victoria police officers answering a domestic call found lawrence in the doorway. lawrence, who suffered from post-traumatic stress disorder, refused orders to drop the weapon.

name: David Felix
description: felix, who was diagnosed with schizophrenia, fled from new york city detectives who wanted to interview him about a robbery. he grabbed an officer’s radio and struck a detective on the head.

name: Daniel Davis
description: davis ignored lake county sheriff's deputies' orders to leave his parents' house and lunged at an officer with a knife. he had a history of mental illness and hours before the shooting told his mother that he was going to die that day.

name: Billy Joe Patrick
description: patrick was shot by an oklahoma wildlife officer who he was allegedly trying to drown. the officer fought his way to the surface of the water and shot and killed patrick.

name: Albert Hanson
description: a farm worker called police when he found hanson's truck in a canal bank with several rifles. hanson fired at officers during an ensuing standoff with a kings county sheriff's office swat team.

name: Dean Genova
description: genova, who was attempting to burglarize a pharmacy, bit one fountain valley police officer and grabbed another officer's gun.

name: Terrance  Kellom
description: an immigration and customs enforcement agent shot kellom during an arrest. whether kellom was armed with a hammer is in dispute.

name: David Parker
description: parker, a survivalist and doomsday planner, shot at police during a 24-hour standoff at his home. the ordeal began when parker pointed a gun at a utility worker who had knocked on his door.

name: Jared Johnson
description: johnson died in a shootout with new orleans police called to an armed robbery at a dollar general store.

name: Joshua Green
description: green took a woman hostage and shot at marion police. his mother said her son's death was a suicide by police.

name: Andrew Jackson
description: chickasha police were investigating a report of a burglary when jackson pulled out a knife and refused to drop it.

name: Joshua Deysie
description: deysie pointed a handgun at mesa police officers and told officers to shoot him.

name: Luis Chavez-Diaz
description: chavez-diaz approached wildlife officers investigating marijuana plants with a handgun, then pointed the gun at them.

name: Alexia Christian
description: christian, taken into custody by atlanta police officers investigating a car theft, escaped handcuffs and fired from the back seat of a patrol car.

name: Jeffrey Adkins
description: officers were attempting to serve adkins with an  emergency custody order when he fired a sawed-off shotgun at virginia troopers and greenville county deputies. adkins had a history of mental health issues. in 2013, a magistrate wrote that adkins "is a danger to himself."

name: John Acree
description: acree pointed a gun at nashville police officers as they served him a warrant. family members said he was paranoid and struggled with mental illness.

name: Fridoon Zalbeg Nehad
description: san diego police responded to a 911 call of a man threatening people with a knife. police saynehad was advancing toward an officer, holding a shiny object, that turned out to not be a knife. court documents filed after nehad's death detail his long struggle with mental illness.

name: Erick Emmanuel Sanchez
description: sanchez threatened to kill el paso police officers who had been called to a burglary. a taser had no effect, and sanchez charged at an officer. a woman who said she is sanchez's mother has spoken to television news and disputed the police account.

name: Kenneth Mathena
description: mathena was shot by smyma police officers called for a domestic disturbance. mathena refused to drop his shotgun.

name: Kevin Vance Norton
description: duchesne county sheriff's deputies were responding to a report of an erratic person with a handgun when they confronted norton.

name: Elton Simpson
description: simpson and nadir soofi were shot by garland county police after they attacked the site of a muhammad art exhibit and contest.

name: Nadir Soofi
description: soofi and elton simpson were shot garland county police when they attacked the site of a muhammad art exhibit and contest.

name: Billy Grimm
description: grimm was sitting in a stalled pick-up truck when he brandished a gun at bernalillo county sheriff's deputies. grimm's girlfriend disputed the deputies' assertion that he was armed.

name: Michael Asher
description: responding to a report of an erratic person, kentucky state police officers shot and killed michael asher during a confrontation at a trailer park.

name: Roark Cook
description: kennewick police officers and swat members shot cook after a hostage situation and standoff at his apartment building. prior to the shooting, cook's mother called and said she concerned about her son's mental state and that he could harm himself or someone else.

name: Brendon Glenn
description: glenn, who was homeless, scuffled with a bouncer outside a bar. he had a physical altercation with two los angeles police officers who were trying to detain him and was shot.

name: Thong Kien Ma
description: ma, who had just killed a man with a meat cleaver, refused orders from los angeles county sheriff's deputies to drop the cleaver and ran toward them.

name: Robert A. Frost
description: a pulaski police officer found frost in a pickup, armed and asleep. he awoke and fired at the officer. frost's family said he was a veteran who struggled with post-traumatic stress disorder and depression.

name: David William Johnson
description: after a car chase and wreck, johnson got out of his car and ignored orders from wake forest police officers to drop his weapon.

name: Joseph Roy
description: gwinnett county police officers, responding to a report of a suicidal person, shot and killed roy when he charged at them with a steak knife.

name: Michael Murphy
description: a beacon city police officer shot murphy after he fled the scene of a carjacking, then threatened officers with a knife.

name: Nephi Arriguin
description: arrigun was shot after hitting a los angeles police officer with his car as he tried to flee.

name: Shaun Johnson
description: a kearny police officer shot johnson after he charged toward him with a samurai sword.

name: David Schwalm
description: an oswego county sheriff's deputy went to schwalm's home after he called the county medical examiner's office and said he was suicidal.

name: Dedrick Marshall
description: marshall came out of his house with a semi-automatic handgun and was shot by a jefferson parish sheriff's deputy called to investigate an earlier incident.

name: Sam Holmes
description: holmes was stopped by a lino lake police officer on suspicion of drunken driving and the two struggled. holmes drove away in his car, and the officer fired as he was dragged alongside the vehicle.

name: Stephen  Cunningham
description: cunningham came out of his house with his gun and pointed it at tacoma police officers who had been called for a noise complaint.

name: Lionel Lorenzo Young
description: young was shot by prince george's county sheriff's deputies after leading them on a chase and ramming into their cruisers.

name: Kelvin Goldston
description: police said a fort worth officer shot goldston after he backed his vehicle into another officer.

name: Justin Way
description: st. johns county sheriff's deputies found way holding a large machete in his bedroom after his girlfriend reported that he was suicidal.

name: D'Angelo Stallworth
description: following a struggle with jacksonville police officers, stallworth had dropped his gun and was running away. police said stallworth turned toward the officers, who believed he was still armed and fired. the family has questioned the police version of events.

name: Bruce Zalonka
description: he was shocked with a stun gun and shot during an attempted arrest by officers from a u.s. marshals service task force.

name: Alec Ouzounian
description: orange county sheriff's deputies were responding to a call that ouzounian was suicidal. they found him with self-inflicted stab wounds and a confrontation ensued.

name: Sean Michael Pelletier
description: officers with the kalamazoo county sheriff's office, kalamazoo public safety and michigan state police opened fire when pelletier crashed the car and brandished a rifle. pelletier had mental health problems, according to court records.

name: Cary Martin
description: martin's girlfriend called police because he was possibly suicidal. when st. johns county sheriff's office deputies arrived and coaxed him out of his house, he fired at them.

name: Mark Farrar
description: farrar, whose family told police he was suicidal, fired a rifle at a rockford police officer.

name: Matt Coates
description: sacramento police were responding to a report of a domestic disturbance when coates confronted officers with a bb gun. his girlfriend said he was bipolar.

name: Ronell Wade
description: wade, fleeing a store robbery, shot at a harvey police officer.

name: Dennis  Fiel
description: fiel exited his car and led san diego police officers on a foot chase before pulling a gun and shooting an officer in her torso. in a prior court case, experts said he struggled with mental illnesses.

name: Austin Goodner
description: goodner shot a man in the arm and shot at st. petersburg police who were investigating. he told officers to shoot him and he had a history of mental health issues.

name: Timothy Jones
description: jones brandished the sword at ruidoso police officers who were called to the home to investigate a domestic disturbance.

name: Alfredo Rials-Torres
description: rials-torres used a metal pole to fight arlington county police officers called for a domestic disturbance.

name: Jonathan McIntosh
description: while handcuffed in the back of a police car, he fired at officers from the arkansas department of community correction and lonoke county sheriff's office.

name: David  Gaines
description: gaines, who had killed a motorcyclist with his truck, was shot by a grand junction police officer after he carjacked a woman and her children.

name: Anthony Gomez
description: gomez shot a lancaster police officer trying to serve a warrant and was shot by another officer.

name: Jonathan  Colley
description: summit county police, called for a domestic dispute, shot colley when he approached with his weapon.

name: Chrislon Talbott
description: talbott died in a shootout with state and owensboro police trying to arrest him on drug charges.

name: Nikki Jo Burtsfield
description: after a high-speed car chase, burtsfield threatened  campbell county sheriff’s deputies with a knife.

name: Marcus Wheeler
description: omaha police were serving an arrest warrant for a previous shooting when wheeler opened fire. officer kerrie orozco was killed in the exchange of gunfire.

name: David Alejandro Gandara
description: el paso police officers responding to a report of a suicidal man outside a day-care center shot gandara when he reached for a gun.

name: Javoris Washington
description: ft. lauderdale police shot washington when he held a woman hostage and threatened her with a sharp object.

name: James Anthony Cooper
description: police were serving a warrant for cooper's arrest in a burglary case. when officers arrived in the home, police say cooper lunged at one of the deputies, cutting him in the face and hand.

name: Elvin Diaz
description: when hackensack police officers went to check on diaz, he brandished a knife. his brother said he struggled with depression.

name: Jerome Caldwell
description: caldwell, a suspect in an attempted murder, was killed in a shootout with charleston police after a 10-hour standoff.

name: Michael Lowery
description: police were investigating a burglary in progress at a grocery store when they found lowery inside. lowery pointed a bb gun at the officers.

name: Caso Jackson
description: jackson had been holding his wife and daughter hostage when detroit police officers arrived at his wife's home. jackson jumped off the porch with a shotgun and was shot by the detroit police officers.

name: James Horn
description: horn was a suspect in a double homicide. he barricaded himself in a closet and was shot and killed by members of the rural missouri major case squad.

name: Eric Robinson
description: robinson shot and wounded a pregnant woman and a police officer, then died in a shootout with apache county sheriff's deputies and eagar officers.

name: Cassandra Bolin
description: an austin police sniper shot bolin, ending a five-hour standoff. bolin, whose boyfriend told police she was suicidal, pointed a gun at officers and herself.

name: Anthony Briggs
description: briggs attacked his brother and neighbor with a knife before charging at huntsville police officers, who shot him. briggs had mental health issues.

name: Millard Tallant III
description: tallant refused a snohomish county deputy's order to drop his gun. the deputy shot tallant, who also shot himself. his wife said he had talked about suicide.

name: Dalton Branch
description: branch, suspected in the fatal shooting of his ex-girlfriend, shot at plainclothes officers who pulled up beside his car.

name: Jessie  Williams
description: williams, a suspect in the abduction of his 9-year-old niece, was killed in a struggle with fbi agents. the girl was found alive.

name: Scott McAllister
description: mcallister threatened his 13-month-old son with a knife and held him hostage until monmouth county's swat team forced its way into his house.

name: Garrett  Sandeno
description: sandeno pointed a pellet gun at edmond police officers. sandeno's wife had called police because he was suicidal.

name: Harry Davis
description: a putnam county sheriff's deputy shot davis after he threw a knife at him and then pulled a second knife out from his vehicle. davis was a disabled veteran and had mental problems, the sheriff said.

name: Feras Morad
description: morad, who witnesses said was behaving erratically, had jumped from a second-story window and then moved toward an officer and threatened to attack.

name: Simon Hubble
description: a san diego sheriff's deputy answering a report of a violent, mentally ill man shot hubble after he threatened him. witnesses reported that hubble wanted police to shoot him.

name: Darrell Morgan
description: morgan, a church pastor, had a dispute with his wife in a store then threatened deputies from the lancaster county sheriff’s department and began to point his gun at them.

name: James Strong
description: the shooting occurred during a drug raid at a home. one northglenn officer was injured slightly after being shot twice during the raid.

name: Kenneth Dothard
description: dothard, who wore a holstered gun, talked at length with a carrollton police officer. then the officer is heard on a police recording yelling, “don’t take that gun out or i’ll shoot you.”

name: Kyle Baker
description: trenton police say baker attacked an officer with a blade from a lawn mower after police tried to subdue him, first by tasing him, then with a gunshot.

name: Kevin Allen
description: allen was holding the knife when he charged at lyndhurst police officers in a library.

name: Nehemiah Fischer
description: fischer, a pastor, and his brother were stuck in his truck in rising floodwater. as oklahoma highway patrol officers directed them out of the water, fischer knocked a trooper to the ground.

name: Robert Box
description: oregon state police were answering a call that box was assaulting his daughter, then 23, when they found him in his driveway with a handgun.

name: Ebin Lamont Proctor
description: yavapai county sheriff's deputies stopped a jeep with proctor and five others inside. proctor ran from the car and fought with a deputy.

name: Alexander Tirado Rivera
description: rivera tried to rob a cash loan business, took a woman hostage and pointed a gun at her. the woman was able to break free from rivera, and he was shot by a metropolitan nashville police officer. police later determined the gun was an air pistol.

name: James Anthony Morris
description: morris threatened to shoot himself and police officers. he was killed during an exchange of gunfire with a medford police officer.

name: James Bushey
description: bushey, wanted for stealing beer from a wal-mart, pointed a bb gun resembling a handgun at palestine police officers.

name: Joseph Ladd
description: greece police fought with ladd in a mall parking lot, and an officer was dragged alongside the car. ladd's family had reported him as suicidal.

name: Usaamah Rahim
description: a boston police officer and fbi agents approached rahim, who was suspected in a plot to behead a member of law enforcement. police said he threatened them with the knife.

name: Kamal Dajani
description: dajani, who was holding one family member at knifepoint and had stabbed two others, was shot by a tarrant county sheriff's deputy. sheriff’s officials said dajani’s family told them he had a history of mental health issues.

name: Lorenzo Garza
description: garza led delano police officers, who were investigating reports of threats and a drive-by shooting, on a car chase. he shot at police from his car.

name: Rudy Baca
description: baca punched a valencia county sheriff's deputy after his mother called police to his home to check on his well-being.

name: Miguel Martinez
description: when the car stopped, martinez threatened officers with a gun. he and his brother, found dead in the car, had talked about suicide.

name: Edelmiro Hernandez
description: hernandez, suspected of burglarizing cars, led houston police officers on a chase. he then threatened a police dog and its handler with a knife.

name: Ronald Neal
description: neal, barricaded in his home, told andover and bynam police officers to shoot him and pointed a shotgun at an officer.

name: Jesus Quezada Gomez
description: quezada gomez told santa maria police officers he would shoot them after they arrived at his house for a domestic call. police found the body of a woman inside the home.

name: Christie Cathers
description: monongalia county sheriff's deputies responded to a call that cathers had a knife. she attempted to run over a deputy with her car, led officers on a short chase and then struck a police cruiser.

name: Demouria Hogg
description: oakland police officers spent an hour trying to wake up hogg, who was passed out or asleep in his car on an interstate off-ramp with a handgun on the passenger seat. when he woke up, there was a confrontation with officers.

name: James Smillie
description: smillie reached for a gun as north port police officers responded to a domestic disturbance call.

name: Alejandro Campos Fernandez
description: fernandez fired a shotgun at watsonville police officers, who were attempting to arrest him. he wounded an officer before police returned fire, killing him.

name: Joe Nevels
description: police were called to a liquor store where nevels was suspected of theft and was acting suicidal. he charged at midland police officers with a box cutter.

name: Damien Ramirez
description: ramirez carjacked a suv on a highway and led police on a high-speed chase. when he crashed the suv, he fired shots at officers. he was killed by an arapahoe county sheriff's deputy.

name: Matthew Wayne McDaniel
description: mcdaniel, wanted for several robberies, pointed a gun at melbourne police from his car in a burger king parking lot.

name: Gene Marshall
description: marshall's wife called police because he was threatening to shoot himself and her. he approached a woodland police officer with his gun.

name: James Johnson
description: johnson shouted at beech grove police to shoot him and raised his handgun toward officers.

name: Rene Garcia
description: while an anaheim police officer was conducting a traffic stop, garcia pulled up in his truck, got out and charged at the officer with a knife. garcia's family said he struggled with mental illness.

name: Richard Warolf
description: maricopa county sheriff's deputies, called for a suicidal person, negotiated with warolf for hours. he pointed his gun at officers when they tried to distract and disarm him.

name: Jeremy Linhart
description: linhart was a passenger in a vehicle pulled over by a findlay police officer. as he tried to get back in the car, he struggled with the officer.

name: Greg  Hartley
description: after a traffic stop and high-speed chase, he climbed out of his truck and pointed a shotgun at himself and then at montgomery county deputies and a tomball police officer.

name: QuanDavier Hicks
description: cincinnati police, responding to the report of a woman who said she had been threatened, said hicks pointed a gun at them.

name: Ryan Bolinger
description: during a traffic stop, bolinger acted erratically, then led des moines police on a chase. he got out of his car and walked quickly toward a police car.

name: Isiah Hampton
description: hampton was holding a gun to his ex-girlfriend's head when new york police officers confronted him. a preliminary investigation reported that the law enforcement officers involved fired 25 shots.

name: Charles Ziegler
description: ziegler, who was sought by police in a bank robbery, struggled with broward county sheriff's deputies and then pulled out a gun.

name: Raymond  Phillips
description: columbia police received a report that phillips was suicidal. when officers stopped his vehicle, he pointed a gun at them.

name: Fritz Severe
description: severe, who was homeless, refused orders from miami-dade police to drop a metal stick or pipe. investigators say dozens of children watched the shooting.

name: Mark Flores
description: flores, who was struggling with schizophrenia and depression, shot his father and fired at bexar county sheriff's office deputies when they entered his house.

name: Raymond Peralta-Lantigua
description: hackensack police answering a domestic violence call shot peralta-lantigua when he approached an officer with the knife. his mother said he had been depressed and had sought treatment for mental health issues.

name: Shelly Haendiges
description: kokomo police said haendiges pointed an air gun at a convenience store clerk and an officer during a robbery attempt. her family said that she struggled with mental illness.

name: Anthony Hodge
description: a fort wayne police officer was answering a domestic disturbance call. hodge opened the door holding a gun.

name: Deng Manyoun
description: manyoun, who was suspected in an assault, charged at a louisville police officer with the metal flagpole.

name: James Boulware
description: boulware shot at dallas police headquarters from an armored vehicle and then exchanged gunfire with officers in a restaurant parking lot. his father said boulware struggled with mental illness.

name: Kenneth Garcia
description: stockton police officers saw garcia attacking a woman inside a car. he led them on a car chase and later accelerated toward officers, striking one in the arm.

name: Zane Terryn
description: terryn, who planned to drive to ohio and commit suicide with his girlfriend, shot at a florida highway patrol trooper who saw that his vehicle had a broken headlight.

name: Kris Jackson
description: south lake tahoe police shot jackson as he tried to climb through a motel room window. police were responding to a 911 call about a woman screaming and crying.

name: Christopher DeLeon
description: officers were investigating a report of a trespassing and burglary when they heard a gunshot and saw deleon with the weapon. police said they shot him after he failed to put down the gun.

name: Joe Charboneau
description: bureau of indian affairs officers shot charboneau after he pointed a loaded gun at them and made threats with a propane blowtorch.

name: Wendy Chappell
description: chappell led alabama state troopers on a car chase and then shot at them. earlier, her husband told troopers she threatened to kill him.

name: Kenneth Lanphier
description: lanphier fired at hobbs police who were responding to a report of a suicidal person. lanphier's roommate also died in the shootout, apparently struck by lanphier's gunfire.

name: Oleg Tcherniak
description: a new york city police officer saw tcherniak attacking a woman in a subway station and intervened. after a short pursuit, tcherniak attacked the officer with a knife.

name: Santos Laboy
description: boston university police officers approached laboy because he matched the description of a man sought on warrants. laboy brandished a knife and fled, encountering a massachusetts state trooper who shot him when he refused to drop the weapon. laboy had struggled with mental instability for many years, according to his sister.

name: Trepierre Hummons
description: hummons called 911 and then shot and killed a cincinnati police officer who responded. a second officer fatally shot hummons, who wanted to be killed by police.

name: Louis Atencio
description: greeley police responded to the report of a "bloody woman" at the door of a residence asking for help. at the scene, officers encountered atencio, who was armed and refused to drop his weapon.

name: Alfontish Cockerham
description: cockerham pointed a gun at a chicago police officer who was investigating a report of an armed man.

name: Adrian Simental
description: azusa police responded to reports that simental was acting erratically and trying to break into a house. a neighbor said simental screamed at the arriving officers to shoot him.

name: Charles  Marshall
description: marshall, who had threatened to kill himself, lunged at a harris county sheriff's deputy.

name: James Monroe Barrett
description: barrett entered into a gun fight with wilkes county sheriff's deputies after they were called to investigate a domestic disturbance. an officer was wounded.

name: Eduardo Reyes
description: reyes opened fire at citrus heights police officers responding to a domestic violence call at his apartment.

name: Tyler Wicks
description: wicks refused to drop an assault rifle when richmond county sheriff's deputies, who were called to his home, came inside. his family told police wicks had been suffering from mental health issues.

name: Tyrone Harris
