description: harris stole a car and led police on a brief chase before he was killed in a gun battle with officers.

name: Joshua Dyer
description: dyer was a passenger in a car pursued by indianapolis police. when the driver backed the car toward police vehicles, officers opened fire.

name: Jonathan Wilson
description: hutchinson police responded to wilson's home after someone reported that he had confessed to a murder.  when they arrived, wilson threw a knife at officers.

name: Randall Waddel
description: waddel displayed a knife to paramedics who were  responding to a 911 call about his well-being. waddel then went into a nearby store, where weatherford police confronted him. his family said he had been diagnosed with schizophrenia.

name: Taylor Culbertson
description: culbertson was shot by a douglas county sheriff's deputy when he pointed his gun at the officer's head. he fired at least one shot but did not hit the deputy. culbertson died aug. 10.

name: Damien A. Harrell
description: harrell, who was sought on outstanding warrants, brandished a handgun when a york-poquoson deputy questioned him about a car accident.

name: Spencer McCain
description: baltimore county deputies were called for possible  domestic violence incident. mccain threatened suicide while officers were on their way. police said he acted as if he had a weapon.

name: Gilbert Jake Vanderburgh
description: vanderburgh pointed a rifle out the window of the residence at madera county sheriff’s deputies who were investigating an auto theft.

name: Richard Matt
description: matt, an escaped prisoner from the clinton correctional facility, was shot by a border patrol agent a few miles south of the canadian border. matt had been the subject of an intensive manhunt for 21 days.

name: Joe Angel Cisneros
description: he ran from san antonio police officers during a traffic stop. during the foot chase, he reached for a handgun that fell from his waistband.

name: Joshua Crittenden
description: tahlequah police received a report of two men fighting outside a house. when officers arrived, one of the men barricaded himself in the attic and shot at them.

name: Alan  Bellew
description: portland police officers approached bellew's car outside a grocery store and he pulled a starter pistol out of the vehicle.

name: Richard LaPort
description: laport, who was reported to be suicidal, fired a shotgun at saratoga county sheriff's deputies after a long standoff at his home.

name: Clay Alan  Lickteig
description: lickteig fired at franklin police as they attempted to serve him with a felony probation warrant.

name: Kevin Lamont Judson
description: judson fled from a traffic stop and led a yamhill county sheriff's deputy on a foot chase. he jumped into a running patrol car and revved the engine as a deputy's hand was caught in the door.

name: Kaleb Landon
description: landon, suspected of killing his girlfriend in northern california, crashed his vehicle and was shot by oregon state police.

name: Douglas Buckley
description: after buckley's wife called brockton police, saying her husband was threatening to burn their home, police found him armed with two bb guns that closely resembled a handgun and a rifle. his wife said he suffered from depression.

name: Ton Nguyen
description: a neighbor told 911 dispatchers that nguyen assaulted him. when san diego police knocked on nguyen's door, he charged at an officer with a kitchen knife.

name: Victor Emanuel Larosa
description: larosa struck a jacksonville police officer with his vehicle and rammed a police cruiser during a drug sting. he fled on foot and reached for his waistband as he turned toward police.

name: Brian Johnson
description: johnson fired a crossbow at west virginia state police officers and summers county deputies answering a call about a hostage situation at his home. police said he may have been suicidal.

name: Cesar A. Limon Juarez
description: juarez stabbed his brother and brandished a knife at west covina police officers who responded to the incident.

name: Arturo Lopez
description: he pulled a gun from his jacket when he was approached by two deputies with los angeles county's anti-gang unit.

name: Oscar Camacho
description: camacho told 911 dispatchers that he was suicidal and would shoot police. when camden county officers found his vehicle, he pointed the gun at them.

name: Joseph Julian
description: julian barricaded himself in his apartment after robbing a bank. he pointed a weapon at miami beach police after a seven-hour standoff.

name: Robert Elando Malone
description: malone pointed the gun at an oklahoma city police helicopter and officers who were investigating a report that a man was attempting to break into cars.

name: Michael Shannon Gaby
description: gaby brandished the gun when a morristown police officer saw him at a car wash and attempted to arrest him on outstanding warrants.

name: Kawanza Beaty
description: beaty ran when newport news police, investigating a report that he had a sawed-off shotgun, approached him outside an apartment building.

name: Bryan David Bauer
description: bauer fired shots inside a hotel room and then sprayed  henderson police officers with pepper spray.

name: John Deming
description: when pleasanton police officers responded to a burglary alarm at a car dealership, the man was standing outside the business. he tried to run and struggled with an officer.

name: Michael Holt
description: holt walked into a hotel lobby with a rifle and started shooting, striking one person. when austin police arrived, holt ran and fired at officers.

name: Richard Munroe
description: he told 911 dispatchers that he was suicidal. when austin police officers arrived at his home, he cut himself and reached for a bb gun.

name: Johnny Ray Anderson
description: los angles county sheriff's deputies were responding to a 911 call from a homeowner about an attempted break-in.

name: Tyler Rogers
description: he pointed the gun at oklahoma city police officers investigating a report that he tried to break into a vehicle.

name: Hagen Esty-Lennon
description: esty-lennon crashed his car into a bridge. when officers with the haverhill police department responded, he pulled out a knife and lunged at officers.

name: David Oliva Sarabia
description: sarabia, who was holding a woman hostage, led atwater police on a chase. after a flat tire forced him to stop, he threatened officers with a knife.

name: John Leonard Berry
description: when los angeles county deputies went to the man's home to check on his well-being, he drove his vehicle into a patrol car and struck a deputy. police said he had a mental illness and had stopped taking his medication.

name: Jason Hendley
description: los angeles police, who were called to a home to investigate an assault, shot hendley after he came outside holding a knife. a man inside the home died from stab wounds.

name: Marcellus Jamarcus Burley
description: the suspect led houston police on a chase after carjacking a woman's vehicle at a gas station.

name: Adam Dujanovic
description: mesa police were called to investigate reports that a man was trying to break into homes. the man approached officers, refusing to drop the metal pole.

name: Joe Cody
description: cody, a sex offender wanted for a parole violation, pulled out a gun when dallas police officers attempted to arrest him.

name: Daniel Hernandez
description: bakersfield police were responding to a report of a man firing a gun in the park.

name: Jose Graciano Lopez
description: edinburg police were called to his home after a neighbor reported hearing screaming from his house. police said he had threatened suicide. lopez fired at officers during the three-hour standoff.

name: Tremaine Dantzler
description: the man stabbed a clerk to death inside a market and was confronted by atlantic city police as he fled.

name: Nicholas Booth
description: the man stole a vehicle at gunpoint and then fired at independence police officers after a pursuit.

name: Joshua Blough
description: blough's girlfriend called elizabethtown police to check on him after he walked away from his car at an intersection. when police approached blough, he brandished a knife.

name: Michael Terence Westrich
description: westrich shot a beaverton police officer responding to a domestic-disturbance call at his home. when officers arrived, he threw bricks and household items out the  windows and then opened fire.

name: Dallas Shatley
description: shatley dragged an ashe county sheriff's deputy with his vehicle. deputies confronted shatley as they responded to a report of a disturbance.

name: Rocco Joseph Palmisano
description: police went to his home after a neighbor reported that he struck a child. the man pointed a gun at the officer.

name: Robert Hammonds
description: the shooting happened after officers attempted to stop the vehicle he was in. the man fled the car and brandished a gun.

name: Martice Milliner
description: chicago police officers were responding to a call about a man with a gun. as officers confronted him, he brandished the weapon.

name: Cyrus Hurtado
description: he pointed a rifle at santa cruz county deputies called to investigate a family fight. in the past, police had obtained mental health evaluations on hurtado.

name: Neil White
description: los angeles police confronted him after he broke out store windows with a skateboard. white grabbed an officer's taser and used it on the officer.

name: Javon Hawkins
description: hawkins brandished a sword at people in a park and then at a kansas city police officer.

name: James Michael Todora
description: when pulled over for a traffic stop, todora got out of his vehicle and told las vegas police officers that he wanted them to shoot him. he then fired at an officer.

name: Freddie Blue
description: newton county deputies shot blue during a traffic stop. deputies were trying to get four people out of a vehicle when one pulled out a handgun.

name: Eugene McSwain
description: gang investigators in chicago pulled over a vehicle after learning that mcswain, a wanted suspect, was inside. he pulled out a handgun and pointed it at an officer, who shot him in the head.

name: Billy Maine
description: maine pointed a gun at himself and yuba county deputies, who were responding to a report that he was threatening family members.

name: Paul Castaway
description: denver police were responding to a report that he stabbed his mother in the neck. he led officers on a foot chase and then approached police with a knife.

name: Salvado Ellswood
description: a plantation police officer was patrolling an area behind an office building when he encountered him. he punched the officer in the face when he was told to leave.

name: David Lepine
description: austin police were investigating a report by a woman that she was being followed. when officers approached lepine, he ran and pointed a gun at them.

name: Matthew Watson
description: watson ambushed river forest police and shot two officers who were responding to a 911 call. he had already shot two people inside a home, killing one.

name: Christopher Benton
description: casper officers were serving a search warrant at benton's home when he confronted officers.

name: Frederick Farmer
description: farmer shot into an apartment building and tried to enter some of the apartments. when dekalb county police located him, he shot an officer five times.

name: Matthew Ryan Graham
description: graham stole a car at gunpoint and exchanged gunfire with shasta county deputies.

name: Rafael Suazo
description: suazo drove his suv into a lynn police officer who was conducting an undercover drug operation.

name: Jason Davis
description: davis pulled out a box cutter in a coffee shop and employees called 911. he refused to drop the box cutter when ordered to do so by los angeles police officers.

name: Chacarion Avant
description: avant pointed an assault rifle at lake county deputies, who were responding to a call about a home invasion.

name: Charles Crandall
description: crandall fired shots at a neighbor and then shot at trumbull county sheriff's deputies who responded to the incident.

name: Eugene Kailing
description: kailing charged at a michigan state trooper, who had responded to a report that a car had struck a house. his aunt said he had just been released from psychiatric treatment.

name: Anthonie Smith
description: he approached moreno valley police officers while refusing to drop a hand tool. officers had identified him as a suspect in a stabbing and an assault on an officer earlier that night.

name: Antonio Gonzalez
description: he brandished a sword at a friend's home and the friend called police. he refused to drop the sword when ordered to do so by wauwatosa police.

name: Edward Foster III
description: a homestead police officer encountered foster after police were called about a man who had a gun. foster's family and witnesses dispute that he was armed.

name: Patrick Stephen Pippin
description: pippin fled a federal task force that was serving a search warrant. after a car chase, he fled on foot and exchanged gunfire with officers.

name: Mohammad Youssef Abdulazeez
description: abdulazeez opened fire at a military recruiting center and a reserve center, killing four marines and wounding three other people.

name: Saige Hack
description: hack barricaded himself inside a home and opened fire on cheyenne police officers.

name: Pierre Gabriel Koellner
description: koellner ran from the scene of a traffic accident. when opp police officers found him, he brandished a weapon and began firing at officers.

name: Samuel Smith
description: smith rammed his car into a seattle police patrol car, causing it to swerve into an embankment. he fled and threatened officers with a knife when they located him.

name: Albert Joseph Davis
description: orlando police officers attempted to arrest davis after they were called to a fight. davis fled and then struggled with police.

name: Jackie Brand
description: brand, whose family had reported him as missing and suicidal, ignored orders from san bernardino county deputies to drop a handgun.

name: Darrius Stewart
description: memphis police said stewart fought back when an officer attempted to handcuff him during a traffic stop.

name: Jose Roman Rodriguez
description: rodriguez was suspected in a robbery when he was shot and killed by a brownsville police officer.

name: David  Wheat Jr.
description: two fort collins police officers, called to find an intoxicated and suicidal man, shot wheat 11 times when he refused to drop a kitchen steak knife.

name: Kevin Thomas Snyder
description: snyder, who had held his ex-girlfriend hostage for hours in her home, pointed a gun at a phoenix police officer and exchanged gunfire with officers who responded to the scene.

name: Charles Edward Dewey
description: colby police officers were called to a domestic disturbance at dewey's trailer home. dewey, who was hiding under a trailer, fired at officers.

name: Samuel DuBose
description: a university of cincinnati police officer struggled with dubose after stopping him for a missing license plate. dubose tried to drive away, and the officer shot him in the head.

name: Joshua LeBoeuf
description: he went to a woman's home and violated a restraining order. he then shot at chambers county deputies and department of public safety troopers who responded.

name: Troy Francis
description: francis's wife and a roommate told police that he chased  them with a kitchen knife. when fremont police arrived, he refused to drop the knife and charged at officers.

name: Darren Billy Wilson
description: bartow county deputies said wilson threatened them with a stick when they arrived to investigate a domestic disturbance.

name: Joseph Fuller
description: fuller fled two traffic stops. when a broward county detective later found him in his vehicle, fuller reached for a gun.

name: Jerrod Tyre
description: wayne county deputies were called to a domestic disturbance and found tyre shooting into a wooded area near his home. tyre refused to drop the gun.

name: Francisco Benitez-Santiago
description: he allegedly shot and killed an acquaintance during an argument. when confronted by green county deputies, he pointed a gun at them.

name: Andre Dontrell Williams
description: oklahoma city police officers sought williams as a suspect in a rape investigation. when officers found him, he lunged at them with a knife.

name: Devon Guisherd
description: when philadelphia police entered guisherd's apartment to arrest him on a homicide warrant, he shot a member of the swat team.

name: Dontae L. Martin
description: martin pointed a gun at montgomery county deputies who approached his crashed vehicle.

name: Derek Wolfsteller
description: a plymouth police officer responding to a disturbance call at a fast-food restaurant shot wolfsteller during a struggle. a week before the incident, wolfsteller's grandparents had called plymouth police for help dealing with a mental health crisis what wolfsteller was experiencing.

name: Brian Stortzum
description: stortzum was threatening his family with a gun. he refused to put down the weapon when horry county police arrived.

name: Robbie Lee Edison
description: edison was killed during a confrontation with a converse county deputy on a rural road.

name: Tamala Satre
description: placer county police responded to reports of woman who had been posting suicidal messages on facebook. when they arrived at the home, satre pulled out a .38-caliber handgun and ignored orders to drop her weapon.

name: Seth Raines
description: los angeles police responded to reports of a man firing a gun in studio city. raines refused to drop his weapon when police ordered him to do so.

name: Lee Aaron Gerston
description: gerston robbed a tanning salon and stabbed another man. he was shot after stokes county police used a stun gun on him and he refused to drop his knife.

name: Christopher Olmstead
description: the man struck four homes and a number of cars with his pickup truck before he allegedly climbed out and pointed the gun at new orleans police officers. witnesses dispute whether he was armed.

name: Roger Braswell
description: decatur county sheriff's deputies responded to a report of a suicidial man. when they arrived at braswell's home, he met them at the back door, firing his gun.

name: Bryan Keith  Day
description: day shot a las vegas metropolitan police officer in the face with a pellet gun as the officer responded to a report of a robbery.

name: Earl Jackson
description: when a florida highway patrolman stopped to investigate jackson's disabled vehicle, he opened fire on the officer.

name: Khari Westly
description: shreveport police were called to investigate a report that westly was holding two women hostage. when officers found him, he shot at police.

name: Zachary Hammond
description:
hammond attempted to evade a traffic stop and drove his car toward a seneca police officer, according to police.
hammond's family disputes the officer's account. the department of justice has opened a civil rights probe into the shooting.

name: Timothy Milliken
description: lexington county sheriff's deputies were called to a residence and found milliken stabbing a family member with a knife.

name: Jean Paul Falgout
description: officers from the terrebonne parish sheriff's office and the houma police department were pursuing falgout in his vehicle when he climbed out with the gun. investigators later found his gun to be a bb gun.

name: Samuel Forgy
description: forgy refused to drop his knife when boulder city police officers responded to a report of a stabbing.

name: Timothy Johnson
description: manila police were responding to a report of a disturbance. johnson approached an officer and refused to drop his knife.

name: Michael Malone
description: officers from the dona ana county sheriff's office were attempting to arrest him on a warrant.

name: Roger Darrin Barker
description: logan police and cache county deputies were called because barker was suicidal. after a standoff, barker came to the door and shot at officers, who returned fire and killed him.

name: Mark Perkins
description: perkins told his wife he was going to shoot a neighbor and a police officer. when douglas county deputies arrived at his home, he pointed two guns at them.

name: Ryan Daniel Vrenon
description: california highway patrol officers checking on vrenon's parked car noticed a handgun. he fled. when the chase ended, vrenon pointed the gun at officers.

name: Philip Vallejo
description: a fort worth police officer encountered two groups of men involved in an altercation outside of a restaurant. vallejo was armed with a gun and ignored the officer's orders to drop the weapon.

name: Oscar Lotari Romero
description: los angeles county deputies were investigating a domestic disturbance when romero threatened the officers and struck one of them with a metal rod.

name: Rafael Molina
description: albuquerque police officers were chasing molina in his vehicle. he climbed out his car and pointed a gun at officers.

name: Jeremy  Hatch
description: roswell police and the chaves county sheriff's department were conducting a narcotics investigation when hatch shot at officers, hitting one in the abdomen. the officers returned fire, killing hatch.

name: David  Cook
description: nitro police officers were responding to a report of a domestic disturbance when cook began shooting at them.

name: Armando Serrano
description: a man exchanged gunfire with tucson police officers who were responding to reports of suspicious activity at the scene of a homicide.

name: Virgil Reynolds
description: houston police began pursuing reynolds because he was driving erratically. once his vehicle was boxed in, reynolds put his vehicle in reverse and attempted to run over the officers. his daughter said he struggled with mental illness.

name: Antonio Clements
description: oakland police conducting a sexual assault investigation encountered a man with a rifle. the man shot at officers as they approached his house.

name: Joshua Malave
description: police from south londonderry township encountered him outside a gun shop that had been burglarized. he fled into a nearby field and exchanged gunfire with police.

name: Franklin Short
description: a powhatan county deputy was answering a domestic disturbance call at short's residence. short brandished a rifle and refused to drop the weapon.

name: Shawn Ruble
description: parole officers were attempting to serve a warrant on ruble at his home. he barricaded himself in his garage and threatened to shoot muncie police officers and to kill himself. ruble told police officers his gun was real, although it was found later to be a pellet gun.

name: Daniel Robert Avila
description: he drove up to a san diego county deputy and threatened to kill him and then kill himself. after a standoff, he climbed out of his car and extended his arm, which was wrapped in a shirt, at deputies and u.s. border patrol agents.

name: Darius D. Graves
description: he was sought by champaign police as a suspect in a robbery. he refused to come out of his motel room and threatened to hurt himself and harm police.

name: Tyler Alexander Dattilo
description: dattilo walked up to two louisville police officers who were on break and swung at them with a knife.

name: John Dieringer
description: greenfield police were called to his apartment to investigate a report of a suicidal man on a balcony. when  officers entered his apartment he tried to stab them.

name: Raymond Hodge
description: maui police were responding to a report of a suspicious person. when officers encountered hodge, he pulled out a gun and fired at them.

name: Keshawn Dominique Hargrove
description: richmond police officers tried to question him after they received reports of an armed man at an intersection. hargrove fled on foot, firing shots as he ran and striking one officer in the arm.

name: Vincente Montano
description: montano attacked a person at a movie theater with a hachet. nashville police responded to the situation and were met with montano holding a gun. the weapon turned out to be a airsoft pellet gun. montano had been hospitalized for "significant psychiatric or psychological issues,"  according to police.

name: Jason Galaviz
description: galaviz robbed a woman of her cellphone and pointed a gun at bystanders. he refused an order from an off-duty tacoma police officer to drop the gun.

name: Gustavo Ponce-Galon
description: elsmere police were called to a report of domestic violence, where a woman had been stabbed. ponce-galon refused an officer's commands to drop a knife.

name: Charles Bertram
description: an el paso police officer noticed bertram had a gun during a traffic stop. bertram fled and exchanged gunfire with the officer.

name: Christian Taylor
description: he drove his suv into a car dealership and a security company reported a burglary in progress at the business. arlington police confronted him in the showroom.

name: Abel Correa
description: las vegas police entered a home to investigate a report of a broken window. when officers opened a closet door, he jumped out and lunged at them with a sharp object. police said he needed mental health care.

name: Aaron Marchese
description: fresno police officers responded to a report of a man with a shotgun. marchese pointed the gun at officers and refused to drop it. the weapon was a replica.

name: Mark Keckhafer
description: a mineral county deputy confronted keckhafer for being intoxicated in his suv near a county fair. he drove away and toward another deputy, who opened fire.

name: Tsombe Clark
description: clark was involved in a fight outside a restaurant. when an off-duty greenville police officer intervened and identified himself, clark shot at him.

name: Derrick Lee Hunt
description: hunt stabbed six people and ignored long beach police officers' orders to drop the knife.

name: Roderick Burr
description: brookshire police were responding to neighbors' reports of a fight between burr and his brother. he shot at his brother and at an officer.

name: Shamir Terrel Palmer
description: palmer drove away from a traffic stop and opened fire on dorchester county deputies who pursued him.

name: Jeffrey Clyde Wilkes
description: wilkes shot and killed a neighbor. when gaston county police arrived, he shot and wounded two officers.

name: Kevin McDaniel
description: spokane police followed him home because he was suspected of stealing a car. after a brief standoff, he came out of his residence and fired at officers.

name: Andre Green
description: indianapolis police said green, suspected in an armed carjacking, rammed a police car and accelerated toward officers. a witness disputed the account.

name: Eric Tompkins
description: tompkins' mother called ardmore police because her son was suicidal and had ingested rat poison. when officers arrived at their home, tompkins pulled out a handgun.

name: Robert Patrick Quinn
description: officers from the pittston police department encountered quinn, who was on a motorized scooter, waving a handgun in front of his apartment building. he refused to drop the weapon, which was later determined to be a  pellet gun.

name: Edrian Rivera
description: san jose police were called to investigate a stabbing that left a man critically injured. rivera led officers on a car and foot chase and then confronted officers with a meat cleaver.

name: Richard Tyler Young
description: a gilbert police officer stopped young's vehicle for speeding in a school zone. during the encounter, young accelerated his car toward the officer.

name: Casey George Alarcon
description: bonner county deputies and sandpoint police shot alarcon while investigating a call that led them to the house. alarcon had fired twice at officers.

name: Randall Lance Hughes
description: hughes had been detained at the grocer for allegedly stealing $80 in food. he brandished a knife on waco police officers who responded.

name: Richard Dean Shull Jr.
description: authorities were searching for shull  based on an arrest warrant for aggravated assault. he shot and wounded two troopers who found him at a gas station.

name: Nathaniel Wilks
description: oakland police attempted to stop his car because it matched the description of a vehicle linked to an armed robbery. he led officers on a short pursuit, crashed the car and then exited the vehicle holding a gun.

name: Redel Jones
description: los angeles police were investigating a report that she had robbed a pharmacy and encountered her in an alley armed with a knife.

name: Anthony Lorenzo Vallejo
description: when riverside county deputies attempted to stop his pickup truck, he led officers on a brief pursuit. after a standoff, he emerged from his vehicle and pointed a gun at the officers.

name: Reginald Marshall
description: toledo police suspected marshall was driving a stolen car. he led them on a brief chase, hid inside a vacant house and fatally shot a police dog.

name: William Smith
description: smith was a passenger in a vehicle that led hobbs police and lea county deputies on a chase. a gun was recovered near smith after the shooting.

name: Garland Tyree
description: after a standoff with u.s. marshals and staten island police, tyree shot a firefighter. he was killed as he exited his home, firing at officers.

name: Hector Rene Sorriano Gonzalez
description: boerne police officers, called for a reported disturbance at an apartment complex, shot gonzalez as he was waving his gun. he had refused orders to drop it.

name: Asshams Pharoah Manley
description: manley, who had fled from a car crash, was shot as he struggled with prince george's officers over one of the officer's guns.

name: Christopher Anderson
description: anderson, a bank robbery suspect, led police and state troopers on a high-speed car chase. he crashed his car, then charged at police.

name: John Unsworth
description: unsworth charged at jefferson county deputies who were called to investigate a family fight.

name: Allen Matthew Baker
description: sunnyvale police officers investigating suspicious activity at a motel found two men with guns. they fired at both, killing one; the other escaped.

name: Benjamin Peter Ashley
description: he was killed by kern county sheriff's deputies after a two-week manhunt. he had been suspected of killing one person and kidnapping three others.

name: Jonathon  Pope
description: pope exchanged gunfire with a carson city police officer called to a domestic disturbance. both men died.

name: Matthew Castillo
description: san jose police were following castillo because he was a homicide suspect. when they confronted him outside a laundromat, he reached for a gun in his waistband.

name: Steven B. Norton
description: he fired a rifle in the direction of kerrville police officers. they had been called by his wife for a violent domestic disturbance.

name: Frederick Roy
description: houston police were called to his home for a domestic disturbance. roy pulled a revolver from his waistband while an officer questioned him.

name: Richard Jacquez
description: san jose police shot jacquez as he ran from a car crash. there were chasing him because he was a suspect in a homicide.

name: Mansur Ball-Bey
description: he was one of two armed men who fled from a house where st. louis police were serving a search warrant. he stopped, pointed his weapon and was shot by two officers.

name: Deviere Ernel Ransom
description: ransom led authorities on a high-speed chase, shot at troy police and crashed his car. he pointed a gun at the bloomfield hills officer who shot him.

name: Jason Hale
description: hale died after an encounter with a stevens county sheriff's deputy who was looking for a man with a gun outside a shelter for fire evacuees. the police had been called to investigate reports of a suicidal person.

name: Wade Allen Baker
description: baker exchanged gunshots with haywood county deputies and local police outside a church. police were answering a call about gun fire. baker's family said he was suffered from post-traumatic stress disorder.

name: Tyler Gerken
description: gerken opened fire on the washington county sheriff's deputies who responded to a 911 call at his home.

name: Jeffory Ray Tevis
description: he ran at a tuscaloosa police officer holding a spoon and struggled with him. the officer was answering a call about an assault.

name: Raul Herrera
description: he pointed a revolver at passing cars and people, then refused ontario police orders to drop his weapon. police found a suicide note at his home.

name: Timmy Walling
description: a neighbor called 911 after she saw walling holding a gun to his head in his garage. when mason county deputies arrived, he threatened to shoot them.

name: Charles S. Hall
description: a maryland state trooper approached hall outside a wal-mart because he was sought in a theft. hall resisted the trooper's attempt to arrest him, climbed into his car and accelerated with the trooper partially inside of his vehicle.

name: Alan Joseph Rushton
description: wake forest police were called to runston's house for a domestic disturbance. he barricaded himself inside the home, threatened officers and then charged at them with a knife.

name: Adam Schneider
description: itasca sheriff's deputies were responding to a domestic disturbance call. schneider confronted deputies with a shotgun.

name: Thaddeus Faison
description: troy police officers were pursuing faison because he matched the description of a suspect in a carjacking. he fled on foot and exchanged gunfire with officers, wounding two of them.

name: Jason Lee Alderman
description: bakersfield police confronted alderman as he was breaking into a subway restaurant, which was closed.

name: Nicholas Garner
description: a wichita police officer stopped garner for a traffic violation. as they were speaking, garner drove away, dragging the officer with him.

name: Kenneth Henry Morgan
description: king george county deputies responded to a domestic disturbance call at morgan's home, where he had barricaded himself in his room. when deputies broke down his door, morgan approached them with a knife.

name: Richard Francis Compo
description: jacksonville sheriff's deputies went to compo's home after his wife reported that he was going to kill her. he  pointed a rifle at them and fired seven times. friends told police campo had threatened to kill himself the day before.

name: Christopher Ray Tompkins
description: tompkins led an arab police officer and marshall county deputy on a chase in a stolen vehicle. when the officers located him, he opened fire, wounding the arab officer.

name: Julian Hoffman
description: brick township police received a call from a man who said he was going to create a disturbance. when officers arrived, hoffman approached officers with what appeared to be a handgun.

name: Bobby Troledge Norris
description: archdale police officers were responding to a report of a domestic disturbance. when they arrived, gross pointed a gun at them.

name: William Lee Snider
description: a neighbor called 911 because he was standing outside of a residence screaming and firing a rifle. he refused orders from las vegas police officers to drop the rifle.

name: Marvin Maestas
description: a sandoval county deputy attempted to stop his vehicle for speeding. he led officers on a high-speed chase, then fled on foot and exchanged gunfire with them.

name: Curtis Smith
description: smith walked into a courthouse, pulled out a knife and slashed a chester county sheriff's deputy.

name: Todd Tomlinson
description: tomlinson pointed his gun at hillsborough county deputies called to his brother’s home over a domestic dispute. the brother was later found fatally shot inside.

name: Shane Rudolph
description: phoenix police officers were attempting to arrest rudolph on a felony drug warrant when he brandished a weapon.

name: Marvin Arroliga
description: miami-dade police officers were searching for arroliga, who was a suspect in a shooting. he opened fire on officers as they approached an apartment building.

name: Steven Dodd
description: dodd was standing on a ledge of a bridge and eventually pulled a gun from his pocket. a hendersonville police officer shot dodd in the leg and he fell to the road below. dodd was reportedly suicidal.

name: Brent Pickard
description: hamilton county deputies were responding to a call about a domestic disturbance at pickard's home. pickard fled in his car, crashed and then brandished a gun.

name: Kyle Lambrose
description: lambrose's wife called 911 because he was suicidal and had barricaded himself and his children inside their  home. lambrose shot at a police officer who was attempting to help the family escape through a window.

name: Bertrand Davis
description: dallas police were called to a report of a robbery at a home. when responding officers confronted him, he fought with officers and climbed inside of a vehicle.

name: Yonas Alehegne
description: alehegne jumped in front of an oakland police officer's patrol car at an intersection. when the officer climbed out of her car, alehegne struck her repeatedly in the face and head with a metal chain.

name: Robert Hober
description: san diego police responded to a 911 call about a man who was threatening convenience store employees with a box cutter. when police arrived, hober approached an officer and ignored orders to drop the box cutter.

name: Manuel Soriano
description: los angeles police responded to a report of a dispute. when officers entered the house, soriano hit an officer in the head and shoulders with a 4-foot-long, metal contractor's level.

name: Gilbert Flores
description: bexar county sheriff's deputies were responding to a report of a domestic disturbance. flores resisted deputies as they attempted to arrest him.

name: William Evans
description: spanish fork police searched for evans after he had threatened suicide on social media. when police found him, he brandished a gun.

name: Felix Kumi
description: new york police were conducting an undercover gun sting operation. when the suspect pointed a gun at an officer's head, the officer opened fire. he shot the suspect and accidentally killed kumi, who was a bystander.

name: Devin Brian Dial
description: longview police received a call about a man wearing a mask outside a pharmacy. when officers arrived, dial exited his vehicle holding a handgun.

name: James Marcus Brown
description: las vegas police officers were investigating the report of a larceny. officers stopped a vehicle that matched the description of the car used in the crime. one of the suspects fled on foot and then pointed a gun at police.

name: Roger Albrecht
description: san antonio police officers were investigating a report of a burglary in progress when albrecht lunged at officers with a knife.

name: Rafael Cruz Jr
description: chicago police began pursuing the car cruz was riding in after they saw someone in the vehicle shoot into another car. when the driver reversed the car toward police, officers opened fire, striking cruz in the back.

name: Shawn Hall
description: cushing police officers were called to a home to investigate a report that a man was trespassing. he pointed a gun at two people and refused officers' commands to drop the weapon.

name: David M.  Leon
description: leon matched the description of a suspect in a residential burglary. when tucson police officers approached him, he brandished a gun.

name: William Rippley
description: loveland police were responding to a call about a man throwing a bicycle into the road. when officers arrived, ripley fled into a restaurant and grabbed a patron.

name: Cedric Maurice Williams
description: williams left a suspicious package at one bank and threatened a customer while robbing a second bank. after the robbery, williams exchanged gunfire with bluefield police officers outside the bank.

name: Charles Robert Shaw
description: twinsburg officers responded to a 911 call at his home. they found shaw standing over his son, who was suffering from gunshot wounds. shaw pointed a gun at officers.

name: Michael Todd Evans
description: task force officers came to arrest evans for selling a sawed-off shotgun. a shot from inside his house wounded an agent from bureau of alcohol, tobacco, firearms and explosives.

name: Arthur Bates
description: yavapai county sheriff's deputies were investigating a report of a man shooting at neighbors' homes. bates refused the deputies' orders to drop the weapon. his wife said he was suicidal.

name: Freddy Centeno
description: centeno pointed what appeared to be a gun at police.  the weapon was later determined to be a hose nozzle.

name: Curtis James Meyer
description: mitchell police were called to investigate a disturbance at a home. the officer struggled with meyer over a gun, shooting him with the weapon. police said he was making suicidal statements.

name: Jose Ramon Damiani Jr

name: Richard Keith Kelley
description: a hoopa valley tribal police officer was pursuing kelley  after he shot another man and stole his motorcycle. when the chase ended, kelley opened fire on the officer.

name: Sully Lanier
description: parker county sheriff's deputies responded to 911 calls from lanier, who said he wanted to speak with deputies. after deputies arrived at lanier's home, he came out of the house and shot at them with a rifle.

name: Harrison Lambert
description: merrimack police officers were called to a residence after lambert threatened his father with a knife. officers shot lambert when he lunged at them with the knife. lambert had a history of mental illness according to his family.

name: La'vante Trevon Biggs
description: durham police responded to the report of a suicidal man at an intersection. briggs, who had been released from jail earlier that morning, refused to drop his weapon. the weapon was later found to be an airsoft gun.

name: Luis Wenceslao
description: ontario police officers were responding to a report of a domestic disturbance when wenceslao refused to drop a metal pipe. his family said he was feeling suicidal.

name: Angelo Delano Perry
description: perry, a homicide suspect, shot at virginia beach officers who approached a car. police returned fire, killing perry and the car driver, india kager.

name: India Kager
description: kager was driving a car in which a homicide suspect was the passenger. when virginia beach police approached the car while it was parked at a convenience store, the suspect, delano perry, began shooting at officers.  police returned fire, killing perry and kager.

name: Carlos Yero
description: miami police were investigating a domestic disturbance when yero arrived and pointed a gun at officers. he fled in his car and after a short pursuit exchanged gunfire with police.

name: Mohamed Ibrahim
description: shreveport police were investigating reported purse-snatchings when they began pursuing ibrahim, who led them on a car chase. after he crashed his car, he exited the vehicle and pointed a gun at officers. he suffered from schizophrenia, according to his family.

name: William Verrett
description: hobbs police were investigating a report of a domestic dispute at verrett's residence when officers shot and killed him.

name: Casimero Carlos Casillas
description: casillas sped away after police attempted to stop the car he was driving. when fresno police caught up with him, he fled on foot and threatened an officer with the pipe.

name: Tristan Vent
description: alaska state troopers stopped the truck vent was driving because it had been reported stolen. he wouldn't exit the truck and brandished a gun.

name: Dustin Kuik
description: ashwaubenon police stopped a car driven by kuik, a suspect in an armed robbery. he got out with a gun and shot at them.

name: Tyrone Holman
description: after holman was served with an eviction order, he began a standoff with kansas city police. during the 12-hour ordeal, he threatened to kill officers with a rifle and a grenade. his aunt said he took medication for schizophrenia.

name: Vincent J. Perdue
description: alaska state troopers tried to stop perdue's car when he failed to signal a turn. he led them on a chase and shot at the officers.

name: William Chau
description: chau was shot by an el monte police officer as he held a knife to his wife's throat. earlier in the day, chau killed his mother-in-law and stabbed his brother-in-law.

name: Tian Ma
description: officers from the potsdam police department were called to an apartment complex on a report that a man was stabbing a woman. when they arrived, the man refused to drop his knife.

name: Bruce Santino
description: a fontana police officer was checking on santino's well-being when he brandished a knife.

name: Brandon Foy
description: indiana state police were conducting a drug investigation. foy brandished a gun and shot a trooper in the hand.

name: Austin Wilburly  Reid
description: reid was sought by lodi police in connection with another shooting. when officers located him at a restaurant, he fled and opened fire on police.

name: Eddie Tapia
description: los angeles county deputies began pursuing tapia because he was driving a stolen car. he stole a second car at gunpoint and led officers on a high-speed chase. he eventually went into a restaurant and held employees at gunpoint.

name: Robert T. Edwards
description: the fbi was serving a warrant at the house as part of a child pornography raid. edwards confronted agents with a gun.

name: Phillip Pfleghardt
description: pfleghardt robbed a bank and then fled in a vehicle. police pursued pfleghardt, who stopped his vehicle and opened fire on officers.

name: Derick Davis
description: davis was a state prison inmate who had fled a transitional facility. a talladega county deputy shot him in an intersection. authorities have not disclosed the circumstances of the shooting.

name: Jack Stevens Jr.
description: stevens was fatally shot by members of the knox county sheriff's department swat team when he refused to come out of his home and fired at officers.

name: Martin Francis Hammen
description: washington county deputies were called to hammen's house because he was suicidal. when they returned hours later to investigate a fire, hammen approached officers with a propane torch and handgun.

name: Clifford Butler
description: pond creek police were responding to a report that  butler was acting erratically and trying to enter a residence. when officers attempted to speak with butler, he shot and wounded the pond creek police chief. his nephew said that he suffered from post-traumatic stress disorder and was a veteran.

name: Jeffrey Eugene Brooks
description: smith county detectives were searching for brooks because he stole a police vehicle. when they found him at a residence, he was armed with a gun and attempted to flee.

name: Joseph Thompson Johnson-Shanks
description: johnson-shanks shot and killed a kentucky state police trooper after a car chase. when other troopers located him in a wooded area, he refused to drop his gun.

name: David Todd Powell
description: barstow police officers responded to reports of a man attacking another family member and trying to break down the door of a house. powell struggled with officers and was shot.

name: Tyrone Bass
description: bass struggled with a st. bernard parish sheriff's deputy and struck the deputy on the head. a second officer shot and killed bass.

name: Florencio Chaidez
description: los angeles police officers responded to a report of a disturbance. officers encountered chaidez brandishing a gun.

name: Jorge  Suarez-Ruiz
description: miami-dade police officers were responding to reports from family members that suarez-ruiz was suicidal. he fled the house and then returned and confronted police.

name: Carlos Wilhelm
description: los angeles police were answering a call about reported gunfire when they encountered wilhelm, who was armed. he had shot and killed a woman.

name: Bobby R. Anderson
description: members of a u.s. marshals task force were attempting to arrest anderson on multiple charges. anderson threatened officers as they tried to take him into custody at a convenience store.

name: Rory Lynn Gunderman
description: lawrence county sheriff's deputies began pursuing the vehicle gunderman was driving because it was reported stolen. gunderman ran from the vehicle and shot at deputies. he made suicidal statements.

name: Mark Gary
description: gladwin county deputies were responding to a call about shots fired when gary opened fire on a deputy in his car. an officer with the michigan state police, who also responded, shot gary when he approached them with a rifle.

name: Lawrence Price
description: kentucky state police were called to a report of a domestic disturbance. when they arrived, price came out of the house with a handgun and shot at officers.

name: Nicholas Alan Johnson
description: when san bernardino deputies tried to pull him over, johnson led them on a high-speed, wrong-way car chase. deputies shot at him from a helicopter.

name: Gregory Herrell
description: dickson county deputies were responding to a call from herrell's family asking that they check on his well-being.  family members told police that herrell had a shotgun.

name: Lucien Rolland
description: a st. tammany parish sheriff's deputy stopped rolland's vehicle for a traffic violation. he fled and then opened fire on officers from the sheriff's department, slidell police and louisiana state police.

name: Scott Beech
description: a washington county deputy encountered beech as he sat inside his vehicle. beech pointed a gun at the deputy.

name: Michael Thomas Pierce
description: harrisonburg police were responding to a domestic disturbance call at pierce's residence. he brandished a long gun and ignored officers' commands to drop the weapon.

name: Jerrald Wright
description: shelbyville police were responding to a domestic dispute at wright's home. during a nine-hour standoff, wright barricaded himself inside his residence, fired several shots and then pointed a gun at officers.

name: Gerardo Ramirez
description: dallas police were responding to reports of ramirez shooting a gun in the parking lot of an apartment complex. ramirez was expressing suicidal thoughts to his girlfriend.

name: William Spaits
description: sand city police officers were attempting to arrest spaits and his girlfriend on warrants in a target parking lot. a gunfight erupted; two officers were wounded, and both spaits and his girlfriend were killed.

name: Tina Money
description: sand city police officers were attempting to arrest money and her boyfriend on warrants in a target parking lot. a gunfight erupted; two officers were wounded, and money and her boyfriend were killed.

name: Steven McKenny
description: a texas highway patrol trooper approached mckenny after he saw him sitting on a concrete barrier in the center of the highway. mckenny became angry, leading to an altercation.

name: Timothy Wagner
description: volusia county sheriff''s deputies stopped the car in which wagner was a passenger for a traffic violation. while deputies spoke with the driver, wagner pulled out a gun and fired at them.

name: Dominic Fuller
description: a polk county sheriff's deputy approached fuller as he sat in a stolen vehicle. he fled on foot and when deputies caught up with him, he brandished a black and chrome object that appeared to be a handgun. after the shooting, deputies determined he was holding a stapler.

name: Dante Osborne
description: osborne was a suspect in a drive-by shooting. after a pursuit, he exchanged gunfire with alameda county sheriff's deputies.

name: Joel Dixon Smith
description: smith shot and killed an okaloosa county sheriff's deputy who was serving him with a restraining order. smith fled to a motel and died in a shootout with deputies. his wife said he was being treated for mental health issues.

name: Tim Kyle Torngren
description: shasta county sheriff's deputies were checking on the welfare of torngren, who had sent suicidal letters to his daughter.

name: Donaven Kyle Anderson
description: north las vegas police officers responded to reports of a domestic disurbance at the his home. anderson exchanged gunfire with the officers.

name: Robert Berger
description: berger broke into a home and stabbed a woman who lived there. a salt lake city police officer confronted him inside the home.

name: Joseph Khammash
description: mckinney police were responding to a report that khammash was holding a woman and a child against their will in his van. when officers arrived, khammash shot at them.

name: Keith Harrison McLeod
description: police were called to a pharmacy after the man attempted to fill a prescription that had been forged. after a short chase, officers confronted the man.

name: Kenneth Ray Pinter
description: a grayson county deputy was interviewing him about two hit-and-run incidents. pinter pulled out a gun and shot the deputy, who returned fire.

name: Jeremy McDole
description: wilmington police were responding to a call about a man with a self-inflicted gunshot wound. officers encountered mcdole, who was in a wheelchair and armed with a gun.

name: Ernesto Medina Lopez
description: miami-dade police were called after a woman and her son had been stabbed. police found lopez, the suspect, and shot and killed him during a confrontation.

name: Patrick O'Grady
description: fountain police officers were responding to a domestic disturbance call. when they entered the house, o'grady pulled out a gun.

name: Philip Quinn
description: st. paul police were called to quinn's house by his mother, who said he was suicidal. when they arrived, he refused to drop a screwdriver. his family said he had schizophrenia.

name: William Lemmon
description: lemmon was an accomplice in a robbery that akron police were investigating.

name: James Anderson
description: chicago police were responding to a domestic disturbance call. anderson approached officers with a box cutter and ignored their commands to drop it.

name: Jeffrey Blood
description: yavapai county deputies were responding to reports of a man shooting a gun at a party. blood ignored commands to drop the gun and fired more shots.

name: Anthony McKinney
description: an east baton rouge parish deputy responded to a 911 call from a woman screaming for help. the deputy found mckinney holding a knife and a woman suffering from stab wounds.

name: Alejandro Lerma
description: lovington police received a call about lerma firing a gun at a residence. when officers arrived, lerma shot at them.

name: Norma Angelica Guzman
description: los angeles police officers were responding to calls about a woman threatening people with a knife at an intersection. guzman ignored officers' commands to drop the knife. family members said she had a history of mental illness.

name: Christopher Shell
description: walker county deputies were responding to a domestic disturbance call at a house. the man came outside and brandished a shotgun.

name: Victor Oswaldo Coronado-Martinez
description: a ponder police officer patrolling a neighborhood encountered coronado-martinez. he shot at the officer, who returned fire.

name: Junior Prosper
description: a miami-dade police officer responded to a traffic accident involving a taxi cab that had struck a light pole. the driver fled on foot, ran onto an interstate ramp and then bit the officer who approached him.

name: Alberto Hernandez
description: san diego police were responding to a 911 hang-up call. when officers knocked on the apartment door, hernandez pointed a gun at them. the weapon turned out to be a toy gun.

name: Patrick Stephen Lundstrom
description: rapid city police officers were responding to a call about a domestic assault. when officers forced their way into the home, lundstrom lunged at them.

name: Robert  Christen
description: a kanabec county sheriff's deputy was responding to a report of a domestic disturbance. christen attacked the deputy.

name: Brandon Lamar Johnson
description: johnson was a fugitive charged with homicide in georgia. he led west virginia state troopers on a car chase and pulled out a gun.

name: David M. Diaz
description: cochise county deputies responded to a domestic disturbance call at his home. when law enforcement located diaz in his vehicle a short time later, he began shooting at them. a sierra vista police officer returned fire, killing him.

name: Christian Pena
description: rialto police officers were answering a domestic disturbance call from a woman about her boyfriend. when officers arrived, pena struggled with them and pulled out a knife.

name: Phyllis Ilene Jepsen
description: washington county sheriff's deputies were responding to a report about a suicidal woman. when they arrived, she confronted them with a knife.

name: Matthew Dobbins
description: randall county deputies were responding to a reported burglary at a home. dobbins confronted deputies when he came out of the house.

name: James Joseph Byrd
description: while stopped at an intersection, los angeles police officers heard their patrol car's rear window shatter. the officers got out of the car and fatally shot the man.

name: Eric Edgell
description: muscle shoals and sheffield police responded to a report of a man with a gun who was threatening suicide. the man fled on foot and then shot at officers.

name: Jeffery McCallum
description: chicago police were answering a call about a domestic disturbance, where a woman had been injured. when police forced their way into the home, mccallum charged at them with a gun.

name: James  Dunaway
description: hurst police officers were responding to a report of a domestic dispute. they chased dunaway and shot at him. police said he had a handgun.

name: Rodney Jencsik
description: old bridge police went to jencsik's home after he reportedly stabbed two people, killing one of them. after a standoff, jencsik came to the door of his residence with a gun.

name: Omar Ali
description: akron police responded to a call about ali attacking his girlfriend in a bar. after ali refused to exit the bar, officers broke down the door. police said he refused their commands and reached into his back waistband.

name: Charles A. Pettit
description: midwest city police were investigating a report of a burglary. pettit pointed a gun at an officer.

name: Donald Miller II
description: monterey police responded to a call about a man with a gun on a public walkway. investigators said miller had mental health issues.

name: Amado Lago
description: lago stabbed a man to death and lunged at a palm beach county deputy with the machete.

name: Gary Carmona Boitano
description: howard county police responded to a home after he threatened to kill someone. boitano confronted officers in the driveway with a knife.

name: Margaret Wagner
description: riverside sheriff's deputies were responding to a call about a woman threatening other people at a house. when deputies arrived, wagner pointed a gun at them.

name: Christopher Whitmarsh
description: beverly police were called to investigate a report of a  suicidal person. the man drove his vehicle into two police cruisers.

name: Richard Love
description: police went to the hotel where love was staying because authorities were seeking him in connection with several bank robberies. he pointed a gun at members of the connecticut state police swat team.

name: William Combs
description: combs told an employee of a nearby water facility that he had explosives in his car. the employee reported the incident and san bernardino sheriff's deputies responded. combs drove his car toward deputies.

name: Travis Quay

name: Anthony Aguilar

name: Joe Pasquez Ortiz

name: Kevin Lau
description: lake charles police responded to a 911 hang-up call at lau's home. as officers spoke to lau's wife outside the home, lau appeared in a doorway with a gun.

name: Bernard Brandon Powers
description: greenville county sheriff's deputies were serving a search warrant at a garage. as deputies approached the building, the  man ran outside and shot at them.

name: Robert Humberto Medellin
description: ector county sheriff's deputies were responding to a domestic disturbance call. he fled the scene in a truck and led deputies on a chase.  when he stopped, he exited his vehicle with a machete and charged at deputies.

name: Jason Day
description: lawton police were called to investigate reports that day was waving a handgun at drivers. officers encountered him at an intersection.

name: Rudolph Smith
description: brookhaven police officers were attempting to evict smith. he barricaded himself inside the residence and shot at police through a window.

name: Brent Brannon
description: brannon pointed a gun at an emerson, ga., police officer who had stopped brannon's vehicle for a traffic violation. and discovered there was a warrant for his arrest.

name: Michelle Marie Burg
description: burg carjacked an elderly couple in a parking lot. she led collier county sheriff's deputies in a pursuit and shot at the officers.

name: Samuel Villarreal
description: at least one indio police officer shot villarreal as he tried to flee the scene of an attempted car theft. police said he backed a car into an officer's cruiser.

name: Michael Donald Clark
description: clark shot at seaside police officers responding to reports of a man acting erratically at a car dealership. he had been found mentally incompetent to stand trial in the past.

name: Leslie Portis
description: the man was wanted on assault charges. he fired multiple shots at alabama state police officers and conecuh county deputies.

name: Jorge Santiago Tapia
description: tapia was a suspect in an armed robbery and led miami-dade police officers on a car chase. tapia was shot after his car came to a stop with a flat tire and he pointed a gun at officers.

name: Kaleb Alexander
description: alexander was a robbery suspect. columbus police swat team officers shot him in a parking lot when he refused to drop his weapon.

name: Linda Lee Lush
description: lush was driving a stolen car. she shot at members of the las vegas metropolitan police department's swat team. police found suicide notes in her car.

name: Michael J. Brennan
description: brennan, suspected of robbing a pizza restaurant, led police on a pursuit. when he stopped, he pointed what appeared to be a handgun at officers from the parma heights and brooklyn police departments. it was later determined that brennan was holding a replica weapon when he was shot.

name: Robert Burgess
description: police said burgess attempted to break into cars and steal another vehicle at gunpoint. officers said when they found burgess, there was a confrontation.

name: Herbert Benitez

name: Jason Foreman

name: Ricky Javenta Ball
description: ball fled a vehicle in which he was a passenger during a traffic stop by a columbus police officer. it is unclear if ball was armed when he was fatally shot.

name: Gino Paredes
description: a modesto police officer saw paredes robbing a convenience store. he shot and killed the man, who was armed with an airsoft rifle

name: Corey Jones
description: jones was shot by a palm beach gardens police officer on an interstate exit ramp. at the time of the shooting, he was apparently waiting for a tow truck.

name: Krikor Ekizian

name: Dion Lamont Ramirez
description: los angeles county deputies followed his vehicle because they suspected he was driving under the influence. the man drove at and struck a patrol car. one deputy suffered a minor leg injury from the attack.

name: Roger D.  Hall
description: jeffersontown police officers were called to investigate a robbery. hall refused orders to drop his gun, which turned out to be fake.

name: Lamontez Jones
description: jones was wanted for robbery. he pointed his gun at san diego police officers.

name: Joel Lopes
description: lopes pointed a gun at sierra county sheriff's deputies.

name: Jonathan Tyler Gossman
description: gossman fled a traffic stop on foot. he shot at cedar rapids police officers who chased him.

name: Miguel Angel Marin Galena
description: a man on a bicycle tried to pass through a border crossing. he threatened a u.s. border patrol inspector with a knife.

name: Ryan Christopher Rodriguez
description: a tulare county deputy and a farmsville police officer were attempting to arrest rodriguez on a warrant. he tried to grab the deputy's gun and fought officers. his family said he had bipolar disorder.

name: Timothy Arnold
description: a kentwood police officer responded to a report of a man threatening suicide. the officer shot arnold when he pointed his gun at police and refused to drop the weapon.

name: Lawrence Green

name: Adriene Jamarr Ludd
description: sacramento police shot a man after he fled a traffic stop and fired on the officers.

name: Stephen H. Brock
description: kentucky state troopers responded to reports of a man walking the streets, threatening to shoot anyone who approached his home. when troopers approached brock, he made a movement toward them and they shot him.

name: Juan Ulloa
description: ulloa began shooting at california highway patrol troopers during a traffic stop.

name: Rolly Thomas
description: cape coral sheriff's deputies were responding to a 911 hang-up call. thomas shot someone inside the house and then opened fire at deputies.

description: muskingum county sheriff's deputies were responding to a domestic violence call. the man held his girlfriend and her children hostage and fired shots inside the home.

name: Darren Myron Fude
description: kenosha county sheriff's department deputies confronted fude, who refused to drop his shotgun.

name: Jon Ployhar
description: when an alaska state trooper pulled him over, he physically confronted the officer.

name: John Harley Turner
description: pickens county deputies were responding to a 911 call about a dispute between turner and hunters near his property. turner shot two deputies after a standoff.

name: Kevin Brunson

description: metropolitan police department officers responded to a report of an armed robbery. mcmillan shot at the officers in the store's parking lot.

description: when tampa police pulled his vehicle over, he fled and ran into a swamp. igbuhay held a police dog underwater and struggled with an officer.

name: Tyrie Cuyler

description: the man stole a vehicle in a carjacking and then led prince george's police officers on a chase.

description: mohammad was shot by uc merced police officers after he stabbed four students.

description: san diego police officers were attempting to arrest him on a warrant. he fled on foot and refused to show officers his hands.

name: David  Romanoski

description: he had attacked his sister and nephew with a hammer and knife. when st. louis county and lakeshire police officers arrived, he charged at them with the hammer.

description: chico police shot sanchez while investigating an armed robbery. he aimed a gun at officers.

name: Ryan Quinn Martin
description: baltimore police on patrol spotted martin, on foot and with a gun. they confronted him and he opened fire, striking an officer, and they fired back.

description: sunnyvale police were responding to a domestic call about a sexual assault. nero charged at officers with a knife.

description: two cayce police officers were trying to arrest bryant on drug charges. he fired at officers, shooting one.
