description: quinn swung an ax at a neighbor and threatened to kill him. when los angeles county deputies arrived, quinn raised the ax over his head and walked toward officers.

name: Mohamed Barry
description: barry attacked several people in a restaurant with a machete. he fled in a car and led columbus police on a chase. when it ended, he lunged at officers.

name: Peter Fanfan
description: boston police were responding to reports of gunfire inside a home. fanfan refused to drop his firearm. fanfan had a history of mental health problems.

name: David Glen Watson
description: officers from multiple texas law enforcement agencies were attempting to arrest watson on a warrant. he was shot when he brandished a firearm during a confrontation with them.

name: Sahlah Ridgeway
description: syracuse police responded to a complaint about drug dealing. they encountered ridgeway, who was carrying a sawed-off shotgun. she refused officers' orders to drop the gun. ridgeway had been recently admitted to a hospital for a bipolar condition.

name: Calvin Smith
description: baton rouge police officers were responding to reports of a disturbance when they encountered smith. he led the the officers on a short car chase and then climbed out with a gun and opened fire. smith's family said he had been struggling with mental illness and had recently been in treatment at a mental health facility.

name: Ali Eisa Abdalla Yahia
description: urbandale police officers were called to the hotel to investigate reports of a drug transaction. yahia exchanged gunfire with the officers.

name: Calin Roquemore
description: roquemore fled a traffic stop by a texas state trooper. roquemore refused the trooper's orders to show his hands. no weapon was found at the scene.

name: Dyzhawn L. Perkins
description: buckingham county sheriff's deputies were investigating reports of an assault. perkins crashed through a window and attempted to attack the deputies.

name: Rammy Jaradat
description: los angeles police responded to a report of a burglary at an apartment. one woman had suffered stab wounds and two other people were injured. police found jaradat outside the apartment holding a knife.

name: Marc Stoddart
description: manatee county deputies encountered stoddart outside his home when they responded to reports of a domestic disturbance. stoddart was threatening to kill himself and had cut his wrists. he rushed toward the officers with a knife.

name: Eduardo Rodriguez
description: rodriguez was a passenger in a car stopped by los angeles police officers for a traffic violation. he became agitated and reached for what the officers believed was a weapon. police recovered a gun from the car.

name: Guadalupe Sauceda
description: jal police officers and lea county deputies responded to a 911 call about a home invasion. officers found sauceda on the back porch of the house with a gun. he fired at deputies.

name: Brandon Lee Witt
description: orange county deputies responded to a call about a suspicious vehicle outside of a hotel. the shooting happened after deputies located a man inside the car. he got out and a struggle ensued.

name: Christopher Andrews
description: fairfield police responded to a 911 call from andrew's daughter. he had attacked his wife and children with a baseball bat and stabbed them. he had also injured himself with a knife. when officers arrived, andrews lunged at an officer.

name: Destry Meikle
description: republic police responded to a traffic accident in which a man had struck two buildings with his car. the driver, meikle, knocked an officer down with the vehicle. his family said he had epilepsy and may have been having a seizure at the time of the incident.

name: Shawn Henry Allen Dickens
description: a mena police officer approached him outside a convenience store. dickens fled on foot and dropped a handgun. he attempted to pick up the gun, ignoring orders from the officer.

name: Paul Gaston
description: gaston's girlfriend cincinnati police because he was in the street waving a gun. when officers found gaston, he reached for a weapon that police later determined was a pellet gun.

name: Joseph Noel
description: commerce police officers were investigating a report of a domestic disturbance. noel showed officers a weapon they believed to be a firearm, and he refused to drop it.

name: Jose Quintanilla
description: santa ana police were responding to a report of a burglary in progress. quintanilla was one of two suspects killed.

name: Oscar Reyes
description: santa ana police were responding to a report of a burglary in progress. reyes was one of two suspects killed.

name: Ronnie Padron
description: parker county sheriff's deputies responded to a report of gunfire at the home, where padron had barricaded himself inside. when parker county sheriff's deputies forced padron out, he pointed a rifle at the officers.

name: Justin Patrick Moses
description: ogden police responded to a domestic disturbance call. officers found moses stabbing a woman repeatedly.

name: Curtis James Dugger
description: an elizabethton officer was searching for dugger, who had warrants for his arrest, in a wooded area. dugger exchanged gunfire with the officer, wounding him.

name: Danny Rendon
description: anaheim police responded to calls about a man shooting at two people. rendon then drove to his estranged wife's house, where he shot and wounded his brother-in-law. he then shot at a police helicopter.

name: Edgar Camacho-Alvarado
description: u.s. marshals were serving a warrant at camacho-alvarado's trailer when was shot. his family said they believe law enforcement officers entered the wrong trailer.

name: Marcos Perea
description: perea shot and killed his girlfriend at a nursing home. he then led officers from lakewood, steilacoom and pierce county on a car chase. when officers stopped his vehicle, he exchanged gunfire with them.

name: Charles Lee Lambert
description: iuka police responded to a domestic disturbance call at lambert's home, where he barricaded himself inside with family members. after six hours, a swat team entered the home, exchanging gunfire with lambert. one agent from the state bureau of narcotics was fatally shot and three state troopers were wounded.

name: Che Taylor
description: seattle police were investigating a suspicious vehicle when they encountered an armed man nearby. taylor refused to drop his gun.

name: Sherrisa Homer
description: phoenix police responded to 911 calls about a woman firing a handgun along a canal. homer ran into an apartment and pointed the gun at herself and then toward officers.

name: Kisha Michael
description: inglewood police answered a call about a car stopped at an intersection. michael, who was driving, had a gun. officers shot and killed her and a passenger.

name: Marquintan Sandlin
description: the man was a passenger in a car stopped at an intersection. inglewood police approached the car and noticed that the woman who was driving had a gun. officers shot and killed sandlin and the woman, kisha michael.

name: Patricia Kruger
description: alaska state troopers answered a domestic disturbance call at a trailer. kruger fired a gun and pointed it at a trooper.

name: Gerardino Cayetano Gonzalez
description: denver police responded to a report of a burglary and located two suspects. gonzalez shot an officer in the foot and then ran. he carjacked a vehicle and led police on a chase, exchanging gunfire with officers.

name: Jamie Clark Long
description: a man with a knife threatened and charged at employees at a train station. a bakersfield police detective responded to 911 calls about it and confronted long.

name: David Michael Green
description: mission police answered a domestic disturbance call where they found green with a machete. he climbed into a truck and led police on a brief chase and then drove at officers. his father told police that green was schizophrenic and had stopped taking his medication.

name: Rouven Loch
description: fairborn and dayton police went to the residence to speak with loch, who was suspected in several robberies. loch told officers he was armed and didn't want to return to prison. when he came out of the house, he was holding what appeared to be a handgun, but later turned out to be a pellet gun.

name: Travis Stevenson
description: east baton rouge parish deputies were searching for the man after his family reported that he was suicidal. stevenson forced his way into his girlfriend's apartment and attacked her and her child. when deputies found him, stevenson rammed their patrol cars with his vehicle.

name: Angel Alan Gleason
description: california highway patrol officers tried to stop the vehicle gleason was driving because they suspected it was stolen. he led patrol officers and manteca police on a pursuit, crashed the vehicle and then fled on foot with a handgun.

name: Baltazar Ramos
description: ramos waved a machete at a houston police officer, demanded the keys to her patrol car, and then struck the vehicle with the machete. when she shot him with a taser, ramos lunged at her. a deputy with harris county precinct 6 shot and killed the man. ramos's sister told reporters later that her brother suffered from schizophrenia.

name: Alex Buckner
description: buckner killed five members of his family after an argument. phoenix police confronted buckner inside the house after one of his relatives called for help. his family told police that buckner had been diagnosed with schizophrenia.

name: Robert Keil
description: blue springs officers responded to a report of a burglary. they encountered keil, who threatened officers with a knife. police later determined the teen had reported the burglary and may have wanted to provoke officers to shoot him. he left a note that outlined a plan to be shot by police.

name: Martin Wirth
description: park county sheriff's deputies were trying to evict wirth and entered his home. he fired a rifle at them, killing one deputy and injuring two others.

name: Victor Rivera
description: when phoenix police tried to stop rivera, who was driving a stolen car, he fled. when he eventually stopped, rivera put the car in reverse and struck several vehicles.

name: Francisco Garcia
description: a los angeles county sheriff's deputy saw a stolen car parked at a gas pump. when the deputy ordered the driver to get out of the vehicle, garcia accelerated the car and struck the deputy.

name: Christopher J. Davis
description: davis was a passenger in a vehicle whose driver led a walworth county sheriff's deputy on a high-speed chase. the deputy and other law enforcement officers were conducting a drug investigation.

name: Luke Miller
description: evans police answered a trespassing call and found two men on the property. one man was apprehended by police. the other man, luke miller,  pointed a gun at officers, who shot him.

name: Greg Gunn
description: a montgomery police officer was on patrol when he encountered gunn, who was holding a pole or stick. when the officer attempted to speak with gunn, a struggle ensued.

name: Tristan Conti
description: lyon county sheriff's deputies were investigating reports of a stolen vehicle. conti shot at the deputies, wounding one.

name: Cedric Ford
description: ford shot and killed three people at the excel industries lawn mower plant before he was killed by a harvey county sheriff's deputy. ford had been served with a restraining order in the days before the shooting.

name: Kionte Desean Spencer
description: roanoke county police officers were responding to reports of an armed man in a walgreen's parking lot. spencer refused officers' commands to drop his weapon, which police later determined was a bb gun. police said that he had a history of mental illness.

name: Abraham Mitchell Fryer
description: a pennington sheriff's deputy pulled over fryer's vehicle. he had outstanding warrants. the deputy and fryer entered into a physical fight.

name: Fernando Hernandez
description: hernandez stole a pickup truck and then led wilson county sheriff's deputies on a chase. he climbed out of the vehicle and exchanged gunfire with the deputies.

name: Nathan Grissom
description: ashville police were responding to reports of a domestic disturbance. grissom pulled out a gun and refused commands to drop the weapon.

name: Earl Hicks
description: hicks shot and wounded another man outside of a homeless shelter. when a rapid city police officer arrived, hicks turned toward him with the gun. hicks had a history of depression, according to police.

name: Akiel Denkins
description: a raleigh police officer chased denkins on foot because he was sought on drug charges. denkins struggled with the officer for his gun. police said they recovered another gun nearby.

name: Dimitri Corcino
description: palm bay police were called when he threatened to shoot construction workers near his home. after a two-hour standoff with police, corcino came out of the house holding a gun. his girlfriend said corcino was suffering from ptsd and schizophrenia.

name: Jorge Brian Gonzalez
description: euless police responded to calls about a man firing a gun outside. gonzalez fatally shot one of the officers.

name: Mickey Dewayne Sweatt
description: gautier police responded to a domestic violence call. sweatt shot at officers from inside his home.

name: Travis Boyd Bradley
description: harford county deputies responded to a report of a person who was suicidal. after a standoff, bradley came out of the residence and charged toward a deputy.

name: Daniel Burkhardt
description: johnstown police responded to a call about a man holding two knives. burkhardt advanced toward officers, refusing to drop the knives.

name: Sergio Ochoa
description: a woman in mesa called 911 and said ochoa threatened her with a gun. he fled in his car to a home in gilbert, where he brandished kitchen knives at mesa and gilbert police.

name: John Alan Chamberlain
description: the man confronted montgomery county deputies, who were responding to a call.

name: Brandon Stanley
description: a laurel county constable shot stanley inside a convenience store when he tried to arrest him on a warrant.

name: Darrell Bosell
description: state police suspected bosell had stolen a .45-caliber handgun and notified cheektowaga police of his location. bosell pointed a gun at the officer who found him in a hotel parking lot.

name: Herbert Ballance
description: beaumont police were responding to a call about the location of a man suspected of stealing a car. when they approached the home, ballance came outside and confronted officers.

name: Mark Minnick
description: azle police responded to a report that a man was shooting a gun in a residential area. minnick pointed the gun at an officer, police said. neighbors later told the police that minnick was suicidal and had wanted to end his life that night.

name: James Scott
description: bismarck police responded to a 911 call about a man threatening to shoot someone with a shotgun. when police located scott, he tried to flee on foot. he ignored orders from police to get on the ground or show his hands.

name: Osvaldo Torres
description: he led south gate police on a car chase after an officer attempted to stop the vehicle he was driving. torres crashed his car and then shot at an officer.

name: Philip Vitullo
description: rochester police responded to a 911 call from a man who said another man was threatening him with a shotgun. when officers arrived, vitullo fired shots at police leading to a standoff with a swat team.

name: Bryon Rosas
description: san jose police were called to a home where two people had been stabbed. officers encountered rosas who was holding the knife.

name: Randall J. Selsor
description: u.s. marshals assigned to a fugitive task force were attempting to arrest selsor on warrants at the time of the shooting.

name: John Charles "JC" Graham
description: carbon county sheriff's deputies were investigating reports of a domestic disturbance at graham's home. graham shot at deputies with a rifle.

name: Daniel H. Chavez
description: carlsbad police and eddy county deputies were attempting to arrest chavez on a warrant for possessing explosives and guns as a felon. officers shot chavez after he fled in his vehicle and struck a police vehicle.

name: Jeffrey Glen Casale
description: hillsborough county deputies and a crisis team responded to a call about an agitated man who was brandishing what looked like a handgun. casale asked deputies to shoot him as he pointed the weapon, which was later determined to be a bb gun.

name: Wesley Sheppard
description: biloxi police were called by motorists who reported a man with a gun. sheppard was shot when he refused to drop his weapon.

name: Arteair Porter Jr.
description: porter called reno police and said that he had a gun and was suicidal. porter pointed the weapon at police, and officers from several departments opened fire.

name: Martin Hurtado
description: long beach police attempted to stop the vehicle in which hurtado was a passenger. he fled on foot and when officers caught up with him, he brandished a handgun.

name: Jason Meador
description: odessa police were responding to reports of a suicidal man. meador brandished a handgun as officers tried to negotiate with him.

name: German Gonzalez
description: colorado state police stopped the man's vehicle near a gas station. he stole another vehicle and drove toward officers.

name: Tyre Privott
description: norfolk police sought the man on unspecified charges. privott shot at the officers and was killed.

name: Manford "Butch" Moore Jr.
description: butler county sheriff's deputies responded to a report that moore was sitting in his vehicle, pointing a rifle out the window. when moore emerged from the vehicle, he brandished the gun at deputies. his family said he had been struggling with a mental condition.

name: Jack Goodman
description: goodman called police and said he was suicidal and armed. when clinton police and dewitt county sheriff's deputies arrived, he approached them with a butcher's knife.

name: Teodoro Valencia
description: newark police were responding to a report of a robbery at a kentucky fried chicken restaurant. police said valencia pointed a gun at an officer as he attempted to flee.

name: Peter Gaines
description: a houston police officer approached gaines after he vandalized a traffic sign. gaines lunged at the officer.

name: Marco Loud
description: an off-duty harris county sheriff's deputy who was working as a security officer saw what appeared to be a carjacking in progress at a walgreens. when the deputy attempted to intervene, loud grabbed the officer's taser and physically attacked him with it.

name: Christopher Michael Tokazowski
description: greensboro police went to tokazowski's home to investigate a report of a domestic disturbance. he met officers at the door with a gun and exchanged gunfire with police during a standoff. tokazowski's family told authorities he had a history of mental illness and the evening he was shot, they were trying to get him involuntarily admitted to the hospital.

name: Gevork Alachadzhyan
description: west covina police were transporting alachadzhyan to a hospital when he commandeered the patrol car. he led officers on a high-speed chase and, when surrounded, drove the vehicle toward officers.

name: Jose Raul Cruz
description: an off-duty farmers branch officer witnessed the attempted burglary of a vehicle and chased the suspects as they fled in a car. cruz was shot and killed by the officer.

name: Joshua Grubb
description: lenoir city police were investigating the report of a drunken driver. grubb attempted to flee with an officer in the back of his pickup truck. a toxicology report showed that he had alcohol, methamphetamine and prescription drugs in his system.

name: Wesley Chad Deerman
description: piedmont police were investigating a report of a stolen vehicle when deerman led police on a short chase.   deerman emerged from the vehicle, firing a weapon.

name: Keith Montgomery Jr.
description: chester police stopped a vehicle that was suspected of being stolen. an officer was wounded and montgomery was killed in an exchange of gunfire.

name: Amy Jean McCoy
description: clark county sheriff's deputies responded to a call from a resident who said a woman was attempting to break into his home. when deputies responded, mccoy lunged at them with a hammer and a knife.

name: Jacai Colson
description: a man began shooting at officers and motorists outside a prince george's police station, hoping to be shot by police. colson, an undercover narcotics detective, was returning fire when he was mistakenly shot and killed by another officer.

name: Lamar Harris
description: chicago police were investigating a report of illegal drug activity when they encountered harris. the man ran from officers and shot at police, wounding three officers.

name: Joseph Harris
description: russellville police were called to the scene where a man shot and wounded a woman. responding officers encountered harris in the street and shot him.

name: Daniel J. Wooters
description: evansville police responded to reports of a man threatening to kill people at a tgi fridays. wooters fled in a police officer's car, eventually stopped and emerged from the vehicle with a knife.

name: Ed Russell McIver
description: fort worth police and u.s. marshals were searching for mciver's son, a fugitive. mciver and his son fled in a car and then on foot into a wooded area. they shot at law enforcement, wounding a fort worth police officer.

name: Cristian Rene Medina
description: los angeles county sheriff's deputies were responding to a report of a robbery. when they encountered medina, who matched the description of the robbery suspect, he held his hands together as if he was holding a gun and pointed toward deputies. his family said he suffered from depression.

name: Eric Hernandez
description: san antonio police were called to hernandez's home after he fought with neighbors and shot at them. swat team officers shot hernandez when he came outside holding a rifle. hernandez's family told police he suffered with severe mental illness.

name: Dennis Penny
description: anson county deputies responded to a request to check on the welfare of penny's girlfriend. he shot at deputies. penny's family told police that he had struggled with mental health issues in the past.

name: Map Kong
description: burnsville police were called to a report of a suspicious person in a mcdonald's parking lot. kong refused to drop his weapon. an autopsy revealed he had taken methamphetamine and court records show he had mental health issues.

name: Sunny Chin
description: tampa police responded to a report of a domestic disturbance. chin shot at police, striking an officer's shield.

name: Scott Bennett
description: houston police confronted five men outside a furniture store they had just robbed. bennett was one of two men who were killed in an exchange of gunfire with swat team officers.

name: Christopher Nelms
description: houston police confronted five men outside a furniture store they had just robbed. nelms was one of two men who were killed in an exchange of gunfire with swat team officers.

name: Michael Mallet
description: contra costa deputies were attempting to arrest mallet on a warrant for child molestation. he barricaded himself inside his home. when police tried to force him from the home using nonlethal force, he came out of a window and pointed a gun at officers.

name: David Alma Giles
description: a jefferson county sheriff's deputy drove giles to a medical center. when they arrived, giles grabbed the deputy's shotgun, and the two struggled over the weapon.

name: India Beaty
description: norfolk police were conducting surveillance as part of an investigation. beaty was arguing with a man and pulled out what appeared to be a handgun. when police approached, she brandished the weapon at officers. the gun was later determined to be a replica firearm.

name: Joshua Douglas
description: a st. tammany parish sheriff's deputy shot douglas after a car chase.

name: Thurman Reynolds
description: chicago police were responding to a report of a burglary at a vacant house. reynolds exchanged gunfire with police, wounding an officer.

name: Dylan R. Whitaker
description: a kentucky state trooper was pursuing whittaker, who was on an all-terrain vehicle. whittaker crashed the vehicle and then shot at the trooper.

name: Boyd Keith Ballard
description: hopewell police responded to a 911 call about ballard, who had stabbed his daughter's boyfriend. he approached officers while holding two knives and yelled at police to shoot him.

name: Clarence Briggs
description: briggs robbed a toll booth at gunpoint and shot two toll plaza employees. briggs then stole another toll worker's vehicle, attempted to flee and exchanged gunfire with pennsylvania state troopers.

name: Abraham Martinez
description: a fort wayne police officer and an indiana state trooper responded to a call about gunfire outside an autozone. martinez ran behind a restaurant and shot at police.

name: Robert Dentmond
description: dentmond told 911 dispatchers he was walking around an apartment complex with an assault rifle and was suicidal. when alachua county deputies and gainesville police encountered the teen, he ignored orders to drop the weapon. authorities later determined the rifle was a replica.

name: Ralph "Phil" Grenon
description: police were called to check on grenon's welfare, which led to a five-hour standoff at his apartment. when burlington police officers entered the bathroom where grenon was located, he refused to drop the knife. building residents told police that grenon had been experiencing "mental health issues."

name: Dylan Pape
description: stamford police were called to investigate a report of a disturbance. after several hours of negotiations with swat team officers, pape emerged with a fake gun and police shot him near his home.

name: Edward J. Gorinski
description: gorinski threatened his parents in telephone calls. when a pennsylvania state trooper attempted to confront gorinski, he fled on foot and attempted to steal a woman's car at gunpoint. he ignored the trooper's commands to drop the rifle. he had just been released from prison and had been treated for mental health issues.

name: Ethan James Rincon
description: miami-dade police were responding to reports of a man breaking windows and destroying tires with a pickax. rincon lunged at officers with it.

name: Travis J. Blair
description: blair fled a traffic stop by a fredericksburg police officer. as blair drove away, he dragged the officer with his car before fleeing on foot.

name: Daven Scott Hannu
description: hannu fired a shotgun at a thornton police officer who had approached his car. hannu fled and then exchanged gunfire with police, wounding an officer.

name: Raymond Gonzalez
description: fresno police said that when they approached gonzalez he ran from officers. police said they shot him when he reached for a gun in his waistband. some witnesses said he was attempting to discard the weapon.

name: Alexio Allen
description: memphis police were called to the man's home. police said that allen pointed a rifle at the officer. the man had a mental condition, police said.

name: Robert L. Dussourd
description: braintree police responded to reports of a domestic disturbance. dussourd moved toward officers with a knife.

name: Dominique Silva
description: a pawtucket police officer, responding to a call about a crime, approached silva. police said he pointed a weapon at the officer and ran. the officer gave chase and silva again pointed the weapon at the officer, which was a bb gun.

name: Andrew Mike
description: mike held his girlfriend hostage outside of the office depot where she worked. he shot and wounded her before being killed by police.

name: Joel A. Gonzales
description: pueblo police were responding to a report of a domestic disturbance. they encountered gonzales, who moved toward them while holding a gun and knife.

name: Mario Sandoval
description: a laguna police officer was investigating a stolen car outside a casino. when the officer confronted the car's two occupants, gunfire was exchanged. the officer was shot, and sandoval was killed.

name: Jermon Seals
description: law enforcement officers confronted seals and two other men after police say they robbed a walgreen's. one of the men brandished a weapon, and seals was killed.

name: Jose Perez
description: lowell police had been called to investigate reports that perez was threatening to kill people on the street. perez refused orders by police to drop a meat cleaver and knife.

name: Terrence Shane Blackburn
description: officers were called to blackburn's house because his family believed he was suicidal. blackburn was shot and killed by a grundy police officer during a confrontation.

name: Donald Andrew White
description: myrtle beach police were responding to reports of a man behaving erratically. white refused to drop his gun.

name: Patrick Matthew McManamon
description: tampa police were investigating reports of two men fighting in a hotel parking lot. mcmanamon shot at officers. mcmanamon's wife told police he struggled with suicidal thoughts.

name: Jeffrey Lanahan
description: lee's summit police were investigating a report of a domestic disturbance at lanahan's home. he moved toward an officer with a knife and was shot. lanahan's family said he was autistic and was grieving the recent loss of his father. neighbors told police lanahan had been talking about suicide in the days before the shooting.

name: Loreal Tsingine
description: winslow police responded to a shoplifting call. tsingine, who matched the description of the suspect, threatened a winslow police officer with scissors.

name: Robert D. Guerin
description: roswell officers were investigating reports of a man driving erratically. when guerin got out of his pickup truck, he was armed with a shotgun. guerin's family reported he had been suicidal in the days before the shooting.

name: Deriante Deon Miller
description: a north carolina trooper was responding to a report of a shooting at a night club. miller ran toward the trooper while holding a gun.

name: Earl Ashby
description: montgomery county sheriff's deputies were investigating reports of a suicidal man. ashby pointed a gun at them and refused to drop it.

name: Joseph Louis Melvin
description: a clearlake police officer responded to a burglary alarm. melvin hit the officer in the head with an object.

name: Robert Morgan Garrison Jr.
description: greenville county sheriff's deputies were responding to a report of a disturbance. garrison moved toward them with a rifle and screamed for deputies to kill him.

name: Denise Fairchild
description: aitkin county sheriff's deputies were called to check on the her well-being. fairchild, who was suicidal, refused to drop her weapon and fired at the deputies.

name: Angel Montion
description: montion, who was suspected in a kidnapping, barricaded himself inside a home. when he came out, montion pointed a gun at los angeles county deputies.

name: Ruben Cossyleon
description: phoenix police were responding to a report of a fight. when officers found the suspect's vehicle, a man began shooting at police. when officer's returned fire, they shot and killed another man, cossyleon, who was also involved in the disturbance.

name: Thomas Lagano
description: jackson police were responding to a report of a domestic disturbance. police said lagano was shot when he moved toward an officer with a rifle. he died from his injuries on april 5.

name: James Craig Simpson
description: simpson shot at his mother and then killed two of her neighbors, las vegas police said. he ran from police and shot at officers, who returned fire, killing him. he died in may from his wounds.

name: Kimani Johnson
description: police said the shooting occurred when baltimore officers who were on patrol saw johnson and his father, matthew v. wood jr., get out of a car while armed with guns. officers believed they were about to shoot a group of people nearby.

name: Matthew Vincent Wood
description: police said the shooting occurred when baltimore officers who were on patrol saw wood and his son, kimani johnson, get out of a car while armed with guns. officers believed they were about to shoot a group of people nearby .

name: James Brown III
description: virginia state police said a trooper was speaking with brown at a greyhound bus station when the man brandished a gun and shot the trooper. troopers returned fire, killing brown. the trooper later died from his wounds.

name: Jesus Juarez
description: caldwell county deputies were searching for a man suspected of burglarizing a residence. a deputy confronted juarez behind a dairy queen. he was armed with a shovel, according to law enforcement.

name: Joel Fabela
description: two odessa police officers were attempting to a arrest a man on a warrant when another man at the hotel began fighting with officers. police said he pointed a gun at officers.

name: Cameron Gover
description: indianapolis police were responding to a report of an armed robbery in progress at a mcdonald's. gover was armed, police said.

name: Preston Paul Perez
description: a louisiana state trooper tried to pull over the minivan that perez was driving for a traffic violation. perez struck a bridge and crashed. police said the trooper shot perez during a confrontation. perez died several weeks later.

name: Melissa Boarts
description: auburn police responded to a call reporting a suicidal person driving on the highway. police followed the boart's vehicle until she pulled over. when she climbed out of the vehicle, boarts threatened officers with a weapon, police said.

name: Darrin Andrew Martin
description: a security guard at an apartment complex chased and tackled martin who was breaking into vehicles in the building's garage. an austin police officer arrived and ordered martin to show his hands. martin pulled out a semi-automatic pistol and shot the officer, who returned fire, killing the man.

name: David Mack
description: an eau claire county deputy stopped mack driving a minivan for a traffic violation. the deputy learned mack was sought for arrest based on a probation violation. as the deputy tried to arrest the man, mack threatened the deputy with a taser.

name: Raul Salvador Marquez Heraldes
description: minneapolis police answered a call about an erratic man with a weapon. when officers arrived, heraldes ran into an apartment and stabbed another man inside.

name: Peter J. Doherty
description: west springfield officers were responding to a report of a domestic disturbance. doherty, who was suspected of stabbing his wife to death, lunged toward officers with a knife.

name: Kevin Hicks
description: indianapolis police were responding to a 911 call from hicks's wife, who said she was being physically assaulted by her husband in their car. police said that one of the officers who arrived got into a physical confrontation with hicks.

name: Marvin Cremeans
description: oak hill police and jackson county deputies responded to a call from a woman who said that her ex-husband had broken into her home. a jackson county deputy shot and killed cremeans inside the residence.

name: Laronda Sweatt

name: Cesar Frias

name: Luis Gongora
description: san francisco police said that gongora, a homeless man, moved toward officers with a knife.

name: Lance C. McIntire
description: omaha police said that mcintire ignored their orders to get out of his car and instead drove toward an officer.

name: Dazion Flenaugh
description: police detained him after investigating a report of a suspicious person. police said flenaugh fled from a patrol car, armed himself with a knife and moved toward officers.

name: Lamont Gulley

name: Quron Williams
description: an off-duty philadelphia police officer saw a man with a gun robbing an elderly person, police said. the officer identified himself as police and told williams to drop the gun. the man fled on foot and shot at the officer.

name: Lonnie Ball
description: ball stood in front of a woman's home with a gun and  when modesto police officers arrived, he fled in his truck. after leading officers on a chase, he returned to the woman's home and climbed out of his truck with a handgun, police said.

name: William Clark
description: rotterdam police responded to a call about a man with a knife. clark slashed at officers with the knife, injuring one on the head.

name: Arturo Yobani-Torrez Valdez
description: los angeles police responded to a call about a burglary. when officers arrived, they found valdez armed with a knife and holding an elderly man hostage.

name: Efren Eloy Trujillo

name: Pierre Loury

name: Dion Daman
description: a denver police officer shot damon as authorities attempted to arrest him on a warrant for armed robbery. he refused officers' orders to get out of his car and made a move police considered threatening.

name: Joshua Moreno

name: Travis Wood
description: wood led a holmes county deputy on a high-speed chase into alabama and back into florida, where a deputy shot him after he began driving at the deputy.

name: Rodney Watts
description: stockton police on patrol encountered three men who ran when they saw officers. police said one of the men attempted to steal a car from a woman.

name: Jeffrey Gray Wise

name: Koltlee Whitson

name: Jeff Robertson

name: Clemente Najera

description: comanche county deputies responded to a report of a suicidal person. swatsky, who was armed, walked toward deputies and pointed a gun toward them.

name: Kisha Arrone
